Summary: Greedy and heartless.  They Wouldn’t waive the late cancellation fee even though I had to take my girlfriend to the emergency room and I couldn’t make the trip.  Will NEVER even consider this place again.  I wish I could leave a zero star review.

Summary Heading: Great location, staff, breakfast and value.
Summary: Room was clean, neat and had everything I needed including internet and nice TV.  Good parking, inviting pool, close to other amenties, food, grocery stores, gas stations, shopping and post office.  Weather can't be beat.  Close to beach too!

Great staff, scrumptious breakfast; eggs sausage potatoes, and really great coffee and tea ! Love the personable reservationists, they made my stay wonderful and assisted me with all needs that came up for me. Mine was a long stay and came back couple more times. The outdoor pool and hot tub were very pleasant to enjoy. Recommend this hotel highly; location, location, location !

Located perfectly in Huntington Beach, but quality of rooms and breakfast not adequate.  Rooms need painting; walkways to rooms need replacing.  Breakfast didn't have enough choices for the price we paid for the room.

As a retiree who travels a great deal, this was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in.  To begin with, the bed was rock hard, the pillows were the size of large basketballs, the chair was ripped and torn, and the maids ran out of hand towels.  Worse yet, in the morning, we had no hot water.  When I finally tracked down the manager (i.e., no one was at the front desk or answering the phone), she exploded at me as if it were my fault that there was no hot water in our room.  As I tried to explain the water situation, she sarcastically told me to find another hotel if I was unhappy with this Best Western…which we ended up doing.  While my wife and I generally are very pleased with Best Western…….the Surf City branch should be renamed the “Worst Western.”
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are sorry that we were unable to meet your expectations during your stay. Guest satisfaction is something we strive for every day and your feedback is very much appreciated. Please know we use all feedback, both positive and constructive when reviewing the services and accommodations we provide to our guests.  If we can be of further assistance, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Summary: Only needed a room for one night for an event we were attending and didn’t want to drive all the way back home. The hotel front desk was accommodating but the room itself was sad and dreary. The pillows were hard and practically like a round brick, the beds hardly had any blanket at all, only a sheet and a thin cover. Not very comfortable. Older hotel. The in room coffee maker worked and I had to use tap water for my coffee and it was pretty awful. It didn’t make me happy staying here and I’m glad we only had to stay one night. It just ended up being a very expensive place to crash.

This is the place to stay, safe, clean frendly, I would recommend this place to stay any time to any of my friends it’s always clean very friendly the food is great the staff is always willing to help when you need help

Summary Heading: Excellent location, comfortable room at a very reasonable rate
Summary: Excellent location and comfortable room for the price. A dated property, but very clean with everything you'll need in your room for a comfortable stay.   The staff was friendly and happy to help with anything you'll need.  Request bigger pillows, I don't know why they use little decorative pillows on the bed, but we needed something bigger.  The front desk brought them immediately.  The room   in outfitted with a large fridge, microwave and direct TV.  The beds were comfortable and the room was pretty quite  We heard the people walking above us a few times, but that was it.  The breakfast was better than I expected, but I would avoid the oatmeal and ask for more fruit.  But the eggs and sausage were pretty good and there were several breakfast bread options.  Overall, if you

Summary Heading: US Open of Surfing is BACK
Summary: Really clean rooms, close to beach & other local areas. Breakfast buffet is always a plus when lodging.  Easy access to other Orange County sites.  Felt safe at this location.  Always a treat to stay in Surf City.  Can't wait until next year's US Open of Surf.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are glad that you enjoy your stay here and that we can help you with any needs. It is always a treat to have guests that are competing in the US Open, we look forward to you coming back. Have a great rest of your day.

Summary: I have stayed at many Best Western hotels but this was the most run down and disgusting I have come across. Felt like own did not care about guests. Landscaping was unkept and the rooms were totally run down. Dirty walls and floor. Needs to have a total remodel. 2 tiny pillows per bed. I had no choice but to stay due to my late arrival and need to get up early the next day. Pictures definitely are deceiving. I would not recommend to anyone and I would not let my family stay here.
Manager Response: Hi Chester, sorry that we did not meet your expectation. We have our gardener here working on maintenance and decoration almost every day. Additional pillows are located in the closet of the room for all guests. We are looking to slowly remodel everything and hope you can check us out after it is done.

Summary: Was average experience the only problem i can put in is when i try to book online by the paige and used my rewards dont le me do and when i arrive and book in the front desk they tell me was more expense if i do with the loyal rewards

Friendly staff & very helpful! It’s a very quiet hotel & conveniently located to stores & restaurants. Nice pool & jacuzzi. Staff seems to take great pride in their hotel. They were very flexible when I had to make changes.

Summary Heading: Friendly helpful staff, but the hotel is run down
Summary: The breakfast was cold and limited due to renovations in the cafeteria area.  The 2nd & 3rd story walk ways have dips in them that are structurally concerning.  I felt like for almost 300.00 a night the hotel should have been in better shape.
Manager Response: Hi Michele, We apologize that breakfast was not up to your standard. Breakfast is made every morning fresh and hot by our chef. It is usually hot during 7-9am. However, we do make extra after 9 for stragglers and cannot guarentee it would be hot. But we do provide a range of hot and cold items. And guest are able to choose from our various pastries and fruit. As well as if they need juice or yogurt. During the weekend it is more expensive as we get closer to summer and we tend to sell out. During the weekday it is reasonable price depending on when you book as the rate changes daily. Thank you,

Summary: Great service and amenities. They gave us bottled water at check in. The staff was very friendly. However, Room was very smoky smelling. I was unable to sleep and considered calling the front desk in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: Hi Karey  We apologize for not meeting your standards. We are glad our staff are doing a good job and will relay that to them. We are sorry to hear that the room had a smoke odor, please do not hesitate for future reference to call the front desk. We have staff 24/7 and they can help troubleshoot the problem or switch you to a different room. If the room is not up to standard when you enter, please let them know immediately and we can switch you to avoid waiting till the middle of the night.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Outdated, they will go into your room even if you have the privacy sign on the door.
Summary: It is a very outdated hotel. No USB ports available.  We left and placed the privacy sign on the door we didn’t want anyone to go into our room. Usually privacy means stay out? When we came back we notice someone was in our room because there was a new toilet paper roll, new tissues and new towels but they did not clean the room or gave more shampoo, bar or soap etc.    When asked why someone went in the room if the sign was out on the door the front desk manager said they do it even if the sign is on. What’s the point of privacy sign if it is not honored?
Manager Response: Dear Louis,  We like to apologize on behalf of our entire team, for not exceeding your expectations. We are sorry to hear that the breakfast was not to your expectation. We will review your comments and concern to help us improve the overall hotel. While we don't have any USB ports, there are outlets for charging. We are looking to open the tub and breakfast area soon.  Thank you

Summary: Awesome location!  There was black mold in the bathroom.   Water pressure was so low, had to rinse hair in the bath nozzle.  Carpet, not so clean. Persistent musty smell that would not go away, even after leaving the door open. Trash and room cleaned only after checkout. Majority of  staff extremely pleasant, one not so much.  Pick up breakfast from hotel staff.  It was always just sitting on the table, so eggs not so hot, sometimes salty, muffins fruit and sausage were great,  Bacon, okay.  Dry toast, no butter or jelly. Daycare next door, very loud in the afternoon,  Would not stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  Our staff follows the We Care Clean policy and are sorry to hear that these standards were not upheld for your stay. Staff is on-site 24/7 to address any guest concerns upon immediate feedback from guest. We hope you come back to give us another chance.

Summary: Don't be fooled by the on-line advertisement of this property.  Although the rooms are reasonably priced, the quality of both staff services and the property were sub-par!  That shared, the marketing on-line site is a true example of deceptive advertising.
Manager Response: Hi Tom, we are sorry that the hotel did not meet your expectation. Due to the current event, we had to modify a lot of amenities that are offered in public gathering areas. Such as our breakfast, it is currently modified and we provide guest a continental breakfast in a grab and go, to-go box. The rooms have been updated since then and everything is more current and new then the photos that are posted. We will take your comments into consider and continue to improve future guest stays. We hope you come visit again and have a great rest of your day.

Summary: This property has some potential. I believe that management needs to keep up with maintenance to make this a better stop. Towels were old, thin and had poor absorption. Floors outside the front door were slippery when wet. Falling hazard for sure! Breakfast was terrible. Grab and go breakfast that was cold and uninspiring. We stayed 2 days and I didn't get breakfast because it was that bad. I am a BW rewards member, but I do believe that this property can get better.
Manager Response: Hi there, we are sorry that the hotel did not meet your expectation. Due to the current event, we had to modify a lot of amenities that are offered in public gathering areas. Such as our breakfast, it is currently modified and we provide guest a continental breakfast in a grab and go, to-go box. We will take your comments into consider and continue to improve future guest stays. We hope you come visit again and have a great rest of your day.

Summary: The area is not good, but I needed to be close to a venue for an event. Despite the exterior, the room was very nice. The breakfast was above average. The staff were friendly and helpful. The value was great.

Love this Hotel and Always stay at this Hotel aince 2019. But this time is gonna be THE LAST TIME. One of the main reasons is the breakfast. But when I has made a check in they informed that no breakfast Buffet anymore, only gives you a small box qnd thats it. So they must advertise in advanxce. Because if I knew, I will never pay a lot of money to stay here. About everything like rooms comfort service space all remains the same, very good.

Someone entered my room when I was out running errands ND looked through my belongings and tampered with my belongings also their was a very bad smell of baby powder in the room that wasn't their the night before that caused an allergic reaction and gave me a panic attack and chest tightness. The room was clean in the beginning but as I left and returned it wasn't the same and being a diamond member I would expect better then that but for my overall experience if you can find a vetter hotel with a slightly better rate I recommend you do so then to stay here with .y privacy are security and random. Guest walking around at wee hours of the nights talking loud and recklessly the guy who works the late shifts clearly didn't care.

I stayed here for one night in October of 2021. It was the best value I could find in the area. It's not far from the beach and is clean, comfortable, and well decorated. The staff is friendly. I would definitely stay here again.

FuneralThis BW was chosen because of its central location to a nearby family event.  The check-in process was quick, and I was easily signed up with the BW Rewards Membership.  The rate for my stay was reasonable.  The room was clean, with everything working properly.  The spa wasn’t working, but the morning staff informed me of this, prior to my stay.  The take out breakfast was good, consisting of scrambled egg, sausage, fruit and toast.  The morning coffee was out early, and it was good.  The staff was friendly and hospitable.  Both of us enjoyed our stay!

Summary Heading: Run down hotel, Stay somewhere else
Summary: We have stayed at this property before over the past six years, it was always a good experience. This time was not. We will not be staying at this property ever again. The property appears that if something breaks, it is left without intent to repair or replace. Our room had only bath towels and wash cloths in it, when we asked the maid for a hand towel, we were told they do not offer hand towels and were handed six wash cloths and more bath towels. The bathroom tile was chipped and cracked, the boarder around the mirror in the bathroom had a six inch wear spot on it. The curtain guard on the air conditioner was missing and replaced with a flat piece of metal with a few screws in it. The hot tub was out of order, with faded caution tape around it and water in the bottom that

So easy to check in! Great room rate! Super convenient location!! Clean interior & exterior - you could tell they take great pride in the cleanliness & & upkeep of their property! Very comfortable room. Great customer service!! Next time I’m in the area & need a hotel, this will be where I’ll stay!

In-room carpet was damp and dirty. Sidewalks and parking spaces fronting the rooms were covered in cigarette butts. Thus, the reason for my "Average" rating.  These issues reported to Management via survey.

We really enjoyed our stay. Excellent facilities at an excellent location. Perfect for a family vacation! Best Western Surf city is highly recommendable as it offers everything you might need during your holiday

Upon check in we were told that due to the holiday weekend, we could only park one car in the parking lot. The other car would have to park on the street across the (busy) street. Our airconditioner was not working so we called and asked them to repair it. They came to repair it, and when we returned it was not fixed. We called the desk again and they said, it's been repaired. we had to pull teeth to get them to come out again and actually fix the air conditioner, which still didnt work well. The TV did not work, there was no hot water, they refused to change our sheets that were dirty upon arrival. Oh, then my car was stolen off the street they instructed me to park on. Summary Heading: Best Western Hotel has great value for the price
Summary: I stayed at the Best Western in Huntington Beach and found the room very clean. The Young woman at the front desk was very polite.  The room was worth the price especially since I stayed at another hotel the night before that was not nearly as clean and not worth the few dollars i saved by staying there. The Best western I stayed in was worth the Price for the "cleanliness" of the room and hotel.

Older motel, very average in every way - however the location & price suited our needs.  We just wanted a place to sleep before catching the Newport Flyer to Catalina at 9am.   The front desk was very accommodating of all my requests prior to check-in.

Summary Heading: Run, don't walk away from this hotel.
Summary: So many things wrong with this hotel.  SO, SO expensive for what you get.  It was said the rooms had been redone.  I guess I didn't find out when that had happened.  The otoman in our room looked like it had been chewed on by a dog and the chair was stained. Heavy paint drips everywhere.  It really looked so old and tired even after the refresh since it was so poor;y done.   The most REMARKABLY AWFUL feature of the room was the motion detector light for the bathroom sink area which is really in an open alcove in the room.  The light would turn on all night if one of us turned over!!!   The room on one side held the party girls who went out late at night after hours of getting ready which included loud music and trekking back and forth to the other party room.  They would return
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We will take your concerns into consideration.

Summary Heading: Not as good as past stays, due to covid concerns
Summary: I've stayed here several times and I was happy. But this time was not the best. The lobby has cheap plastic sheeting over the counter. Seems like they could have set up a better looking barrier.  The room looked clean, but there was no daily housekeeping. So I had to go down to the lobby to get fresh towels.  And the trash basket was never emptied. The breakfast buffet was eliminated and I was told that I could pick up a bagged snack in the morning. I did that once. But it was just cookies, a little snack bar, and a water. There was a party down the hall one night. It was difficult to sleep.  We were there for 3 nights. At least the bed mattress was comfortable. I understand that sacrifices are needed due to covid and I have been happy with previous stays here. So, I will most

Summary Heading: Great, clean rooms, can't wait until we can swim again!
Summary: Great, clean rooms, can't wait until we can swim again! Check in was easy and the staff was friendly. The amenities were useful. The elevator was a definite plus. The property has a real beachy feel to it. Enjoy!

Review a Best Western am I stays that I've had there in the past 12 months  Have been  Exceptional. Their staff their cleanliness overall experience has been great. I would recommend staying  At any of their locationsTo all my Family and friends.

Rooms were clean and good size.  Linens were poor quality and bare minimum.  Facility is noisy from guests well after quiet time Dim lighting in room as well as poor water pressure.  Plan on going elsewhere for breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. on behalf of our intire team, i would like to appologzire for not exceeding your expectation. We will use your feedback to better our self.

Summary Heading: Expect a motel 6 experience with only slightly nicer amenities. Very noisy!
Summary: I was very disappointed with the quality for the cost. It is a motel and fell short of my expectations of a best western. We had a room at the end of the hotel that was nice because it blocked the road noise. But then we had drunken revellers going up and down the stairs all night and morning making tons of noise and making it impossible to sleep.

Really good hotel to stay at front desk super friendly and staff that cleans room do very good my family really enjoyed the time we stayed will be definitely returning in the future also it was just a few blocks from the beach

Summary Heading: No frills, but nice place to stay
Summary: The overall cleanliness of the room was very good.  Bedding was clean, but had that "old sheets" smell.  Would be nice if they used bleach when laundering, not only for freshness but for looks, there were a lot of stains on the towels and they were very, very thin.  Pillows were a little hard and lumpy.  (Costco/Sams have pillows very reasonable, would be great if rooms received a little upgrade)   Towels were also old.  Other than that, the room was clean.  Lights around the pool and property at night were a very nice touch, pleasant to drive into property and helped with lighting the parking area.

Idk if it’s because of covid but Check in and check out was super quick. I had the ac on 60 and high and the blankets they had kept us cozy. I like how the walkway is nonsmoking and how big the parking spaces are and how many spaces there were. I had 4 kids with me and at no point did I feel crowded.

Summary Heading: Nice Interior, But Still Cheap Motel w/ Sketchy Visitors
Summary: Pro's:  Nicely designed interior Comfy Bed Wifi Decent toiletries  Con's:  Front desk guy Vietnamese young guy- no smile, no warmth and very stern :/ Sketchy people roaming around the property smoking (it's non smoking)  Traffic noise from Beach Blvd- all night long Bright light right outside my window, so had to keep curtains closed No privacy unless you keep curtains closed, as people walk can walk by and look into your room (set up is like a Motel 6)  In the morning, I awoke to dozens of children screaming at the daycare across the parking lot PIllows were small and low quality In Dec (even in CA) it can be cold- was 47 degrees- but they only give 1 blanket unless you go to front to ask for 1 more! :( Towels were clean, but worn ridiculously thin shower head was a tall goose

Based on pictures, I figured this would be a decent hotel. Ummm...nope. It looks run down from the moment you pull into the location. There are questionable people hanging out all over the property. I did not feel safe. Honestly felt more the quality of a hole in the wall cheap motel.  The room was surprisingly nice. Decor was nice and the bed was comfy. However I just didn't feel comfortable and left around 1am. After checking in at 3pm. I just couldn't stay any longer. I will never stay here again or even recommend anyone wasting their money on it. I don't care if it's a Best Western... In my opinion, it DOES NOT meet the companies quality I have become accustomed to.

The vent and the light switches were broken. Couldn't shut it off. The room had an odor as well. The beds were made nicely and the mattress comfortable, but the pillows did not fit a queen/king size bed. The were the type you get at walmart for $5. Not comfortable at all.

Very comfterbul and extremely clean Breakfast was not open however understandable due to the virus staff was extremely kind suprising was that you could not hear the road even with the great location on beach blvd

We called the front desk and he said he called the police and that they were “getting rid of them”, but they never left.  The next morning we came to an agreement with the front desk workers on a measly 15% off discount. He said he would contact the manager and they would send us our information.  We heard back from booking.com (the party that we booked with) and this is what we got. Image attached.  So then, we called the front desk to see what was going on, since we did come to an agreement before checkout. Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We have a strict no smoking , no pets, and quiet after 8pm policy.

Summary Heading: Great stay, team was amazing and helpful!
Summary: Great property, rooms, pool and area are very nice! The staff was exceptional as I've been traveling for personal reasons and have needed some flexibility. They were able to add to my time, increase the days and accommodate the changes of schedule. Really a great time and vibe, will come back.

We've stayed here twice this year. Great value in a good location. Just minutes from the beach and near any restaurant you want. Front desk was awesome. We had 1 small issues with makeup smear on a clean towel.   Called the front desk and it was replaced within a couple minutes.

Summary Heading: Two night get away to rest with my man!
Summary: I needed a place to put my feet up and relax. While the beds were very comfy (Extremely comfortable) the cleanliness of our room was to be desired! Breakfast was so bomb though... Lots to choose from....Simply delicious

Four days on Beach Blv. a short drive to the pier was awesome. Hotel location was perfect as well as the service. A nice walk up Beach to Hertz was perfect. They call it winter but for me 70 and empty beaches is my kind of winter! Kicking around on the beach and waiting on the sunset is good medicine! I will plan this winter trip every year going forward. The front desk friends will welcome me back again next year.

My husband and I wanted a getaway and decided to go to Huntington Beach.  The hotel we chose offered breakfast daily which was okay.  The location was great close to the strip of restaurants of many choice.   Hotel staff was friendly and accommodating when we had questions.   Someone was bouncing a ball which we had to report and they called the people with the bouncing ball and it stopped.   Would stay there again.  Bed was comfortable as usually as in all best western hotels

We booked this hotel for Jan. 15 - 18th, on Nov. 13.  we paid for the reservation then.  On jan. 15th we flew 1,600 miles to HB, arriving at the hotel around 7:30 pm and the smug desk clerk tells me that I had cancelled the reservation.  I was not happy.  We called Expedia, they said the reservation was still valid.  Fortunately Expedia was able to find us a hotel up the street as BW was full.  I don't know why they lied to us, we have been staying there for 18 years.  We are unable to get this resolved.
Manager Response: Unfortunately we have little contol over third party reservations, we are sorry this happened to you, and thank you for your feedback, your comments will help us in the future.

Summary: The exterior of this property had me worried, it looks a bit dated.  Pleasant surprise to see the rooms were very clean and nicely updated. Beds were very comfortable, nice linens, thick fluffy towels. Fridge and microwave. Hotel does have exterior coridor, so even though screened Windows open, you might leave them closed for privacy. Nice pool and hot tub,but you have to walk across the parking lot to get to it, and no afternoon sun by the pool, the building shades it.   Breakfast was good, eggs were real eggs, not powdered and better than average sausage. Good value, easy drive to the beach or pier.  Ok noise level, could here a bit of laughter through the walls, and since all rooms face  parking lot you do hear the people who don't know how to lock/unlock their cars without

I normally don't stay at Best Westerns, but this room was booked for me because of a work commitment. I was pleasantly surprised with my stay. The receptionist was very friendly and this three-story property had an elevator, even though it had outdoor hallways. The room was of typical size, but the bed was comfortable, the heat worked well and the the TV was decently-sized and had a lot of channels to choose from.  The two big surprises for me were the wifi speed (80/80) and the quality of the towels. There's not a lot a hotel owner/manager can do about their physical location and massive upgrades to the rooms can be very costly. However, giving guests free & fast wifi is a relatively-easy and inexpensive option. Bath towels are a little more expensive and likely to "walk away"
Manager Response: Hi James,   Thank you so much for your review! We hope to see you again soon :)

Summary: My friend and I had such an enjoyable stay at the Best Western Surf City in Huntington Beach. The hotel was clean and equipped with everything we needed/wanted, just like home. The bed was very comfy and the pillows were amazing. We had to remove the pillowcase to look for the brand so that we may purchase it. The breakfast was simple but absolutely delicious, the scrambled eggs, sausages and potatoes were sumptuous. The coffee was excellent and the different types of teas were lovely.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are planning on expanding the breakfast options even more with upcoming renovations. Stay tuned! ;)

Summary: A very central place to stay while in Huntington Beach. Close to everything; Beach, shopping, freeways. Hotel was clean, friendly and helpful. Had what we needed. Breakfast was good. A small area but had what we wanted.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: This is a decent hotel. It’s in a good location. The rooms are a nice size and the beds are comfortable. They didn’t have any blankets to add to the bed on a cold night so I was cold most nights. The bathroom could use some upgrade. The towels are scratchy and not very absorbent. The pool was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We will look into your concerns as the quality of our products is very important to us. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Two night stay at Surf City Best Western
Summary: The breakfast food was terrible. No coffee ready when we came in to eat.  Eggs and potatoes looked and tasted nasty.   The response to correcting a noise situation from 11:15 pm to 2:00 am took 2 hours and 45 minutes and  was terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review us. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.  If I can provide any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me directly at 714-962-4244.  Sincerely,  Van Than General Manager Best Western Surf City

Summary: Our experience was a surprise to us - for the money, in the area we stayed, we had a wonderful stay.  The room was clean, well-decorated and comfortable.  The staff was friendly and knowledgable, and the rooms were well-maintained.  In an area where rooms can go for over $400 a night, we would certainly stay here again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Hotel bathroom was dirty  Sheets had hair on them The room smells moldy  Was close to family home, but will not Stay here again. Not a lot of hotel options in the area that are less than $300/ night but will pay it next time.
Manager Response: Hi Stacy, we deeply apologize for your dis-satisfactory experience! We try and address problems immediately as soon as our guests are in-house and so appreciate feedback throughout the whole process. If you are ever inclined to return to us to give us another chance to prove ourselves, we would love to have you. :)

Summary: The staff was awesome and the staff was friendly but the room had 10 crickets and 2 cockroaches. the ac/heater unit broke . Also the cap for the sewer was missing so we had to tell maintenance. . the locatrion was absolutely wonderful
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, your comments will allow us to improve for future stays.

Summary: The hotel was in walking distance to many of my favorite place and only 5 miles from where I needed to be. The staff was help and accommodating. Parking was a bit scarce but you are able to park on the main street if you want to take that chance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I recently stayed for five days at this hotel. It is a great value and as a solo traveler, I truly appreciated the easy access to park!   Everyone was very Friendly and helpful. The maid service was dependable and the linens were very comfortable and cozy.  The breakfast was basic but very tasty. Overall a very good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Good option in an expensive area
Summary: We stayed here for several nights last spring while attending an event and found this hotel to be a good choice.  It's convenient to the freeway and an approximate 15-minute drive to the beach and downtown Huntington Beach.  The hotel is nicer than usual for Best Westerns, has a nice staff, decent breakfast, good Wi-Fi, and tons of TV channels—way more than are on the printed list.  Its one downside is that it's on a major, busy street, but that wouldn't stop us from staying here again—very satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with my room. The exterior of the building is a little dated, so I expected the room to be a bit dated. But it wasn't. The bed was comfortable and the room itself was quite large. The staff were friendly and the breakfast was good. Though the one detractor would be that there definitely was not enough seating(only 5 tables)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are planning to renovate the breakfast area soon! We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The breakfast was nothing special didn’t offer as much as other bBest westerns I’ve stayed in not many amenities. Lobby not very nicely decorated or welcoming. The rooms were clean but no exercise facilities didn’t give a lot of information offered by staff of services available at facility. Location was good for the event we were attending. Price with membership was still not really worth the value
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to make improvements to offer guests a better experience in the future. We hope you will give us another chance and stay with us again. -Best Western Hotels & Resorts

Summary: we love to visit huntington beach... we have stayed a several of the hotels along beach blvd & along the pch, over the years.  the best western surf city has consistently been a decent place to stay over the years. currently they are under construction & had we known, we would have chosen another place this time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input.  Your comments will help us improve for future stays.

Summary: The outside of the building is really old, They are currently updating but iT Will take a long time before up to standard. There is new floaring in the room,  rest is dated. Breakfast was Very busy so had to clean the table myself. The walls are Very thin which was rather annoying as the love making on the upper Floor was apparantly enjoyable for at lease Some one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, your input will help us improve for future stays.

Summary: My 1 1/2 year old got a stomach virus about 2 am on the day we were to check out.He vomited every 20 minutes for four hours. I asked for late check out as they informed me that they were fully booked so could not reserve another night. They would only allow one extra hour. I packed in between bouts of  the baby puking. At 10:45 the vomiting had eased and he was napping a little. I figured I could load my vehicle as I was parked directly below my room and close to the stairs. The stairs were blocked by workers. I had to call to get someone to help. The maintenance guy came up to get my luggage. He was very nice. He took my luggage down and I woke up the poor baby and followed him down, As he loaded my luggage my little guy vomited twice.If I hadnt turned quickly to the side, it
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the inconvenience but it is unfortunately hotel policy for check out to be at 11am so that we can get all rooms clean for the next guests by the check-in time! :)

Summary Heading: Inappropriate for college students to film projects
Summary: The stay was great except environment was noisy after 2am!! Had problems sleeping because college students were up late filming for an art class. Also the a/c in room did not have continuous fan to drown out noises. Either you freeze or suffer for extra noises outside when a/c reached certain temperature to shut off.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, your comments will help us improve for future stays.

Summary Heading: A place where to stop also a week!
Summary: On the main road for Huntington Beach just out from 405 South (if you come from Santa Barbara). Pool in a great place and not in the middle of the road entrance as in some other place where . Close to State street, street where there are all the foods and drinks places area and where you can enjoy walking close to the beach! Close to the walking on the Ocean and to the best Surf Beaches ! Close to New Port Beach where you can go for Whale watching tour. Cleaned , big room, service was great from the housekeeping! Just the service from help desk was a bit poor since people there seemed to be there just because they didn't have to do anything else and sometime , when you are in front of them they wait 5 minutes before speaking to you! Jacuzzi in the bathroom ( also if we didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, your comments will help us improve for future stays.

Summary: Upon arrival, the front office had a musty/moldy smell. Our room also had a musty odor. Due to the 72 hour cancellation policy and being Labor Day weekend, we didn’t have any other options. The humidity in our room was around 70+% and that is indicative of moisture leading to mold and mildew. Reported the problem to the front desk and to our knowledge, it was never checked out. Would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay, and we are sorry to hear that it did not exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we hope you will give us another chance and stay with us again. -Best Western Hotels & Resorts

Summary: Great stay at the Best Western Surf City!  The beds were comfy, I needed an extra blanket, but it was in the closet for me already.  The staff was very nice and always greeted me with a smile when I came in to ask questions.  Breakfast was good and we liked that they had different options each morning (we stayed 6 days).  We would definately stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay.  Hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Nothing fancy, and it’s just a little street side place that doesn’t look like much, but the beds were great, the rooms were clean and spacious, WiFi was reliable, and the free hot breakfast was pretty good for that kind of thing. Everyone was friendly, and processing was efficient. We were on first floor and not at all bothered by noise. I’m glad we stayed there instead a fancier place, since visiting family was our focus.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: My Son and I rented our room for 2 nights and were pleasantly surprised. We came down from Las Vegas just to get a break from the heat for a few days and really did not know what to expect from this motel as far as quality and service, turns out it was very good. The rooms had been updated, the front desk was very friendly and just overall, for the price this motel was just great.. We really had no problems and had a great time getting away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Good for the price and location
Summary: The room was clean. The pool area is nice. There's plenty of parking. The staff is friendly.  Breakfast food was hot and replenished as needed. It's not close enough to the beach to walk.  Non smoking hotel 🙂 It's too far to walk to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, your comments will help us with future stays.

Summary: This hotel was a pleasant surprise. It is located near the beach and the town shops and restaurants. My room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was very good and the staff members were very friendly and helpful.  I will be visiting this area frequently and will come back here again.

Best empolyess in the reception/check in and the room is great and quiet.  I will stay here again and recommend it anytime.  Really the best option for Huntington Beach area and easy to get to with lots of stores and restaurants close

Cockroaches. Broken toilet. This place was a sh*thole. Do not stay here.  It is one of the strip mall style motels located next to a liquor store. They don't get zero stars because the 1970's style, never updated bathroom, had current soap and shampoo.  The breakfast was solid.  Although the single kitchen worker could not keep up with the customers and at 0800 in the morning they were out of eggs, whole milk, 2% milk, pancakes, pastries, and fruit. But you could have as much dry cereal as you wanted.  Do not spend your money at this Best Western. It is the Worst Western. By the way, when I told them about the cockroaches, they ALREADY HAD A BLACKLIGHT to look for evidence of them.  Hhmmm, consistent cockroach issue? Disgusting.
Manager Response: Hi Jonathan Jockyridge!  We’re sorry to hear about your stay, and thankful for your feedback. In regards to your stay, we ensure you that our hotel is newly renovated and all rooms are clean. It is standard for most hotels to have a black light operating procedure to do black light room inspections. We do inspections before and after any check-outs / check-ins to ensure there isn’t problems before checking-in our customers. In addition, our housekeepers clean the hotel rooms daily.   As you recall that we did spent over an hour and a half with you and your wife to look all over the room, even moved furniture to make sure there wasn’t any trace of bugs in your room.  You also mention that you had a broken toilet, if you had a broken toilet the room wouldn’t be available to you because we close out any room for it to be fixed. As you know, because you stayed here, that we have 24/7 front desk service, so if you had any problems you definitely could have reported to our front desk, and we are there to help you right away. Our continental breakfast is complimentary. Breakfast items do run out sometimes, but do get restock right away. We’re not a running restaurant kitchen so things do take time. Our breakfast only runs from 7AM – 10AM.   If you had any more concerns please feel to contact us 714-962-4244.  Best, Best Western Surf City Team

Summary Heading: The Best option in huntington Beach
Summary: Me and my son (14 years of age) loved everything. Excellent location, great room space, really quiet (highest floor and in the end), room renew, great internet connection, excellent breakfast and nice price in compare of others Hotels on the same Blvd.

Friendly staff, comfortable updated room. Exterior of hotel is tired and dated. Breakfast is low quality, processed foods. Since I have to write 200 characters, I am writing this sentence. Cheers to everyone.

Hotel is very nice but old. Staff is trying to keep it up. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Rooms are big but hard beds. Breakfast is so so, not much to choose from. Bathrooms are small but showers are really nice.

Room was clean and well maintained. Had problems with card keys both days of our stay. Room information book showed that breakfast service started at 6:00 AM, but it actually started at 7:00 AM. This necessitated getting breakfast elsewhere.

For the price this is a good hotel. Very, very nice staff and location. Room updated, breakfast included. Location fabulous as about a mile to beach. Very clean. Pool near road and bathroom small but no complaints, overall highly recommend for price.
Manager Response: thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Older hotel but clean with fridge and microwave. Nice desk area but not updated for digital age.  Lamp only had 1 outlet and there were no USB ports so you have to be sure you bring your USB connectors. WIFi good. Staff friendly and quick check in and out. Breakfast good but seating area small.
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, your comments will help us with future stays.

Summary: 1 night stay In HB Van the owner and her staff were very gracious and helpful!! Newly renovated rooms and the pool deck sounds like they are about to renovate the breakfast area as well as the Lobby and some of the grounds
Manager Response: Thank you for your input, your comments will help us with future stays.

Summary: I will review the stay in order. First off, it is an older property. Pool and jacuzzi area was clean. The front desk staff was very courteous, and check-in was fast. The room was clean, and large, with the only drawback being that the furniture needed to be updated. I reserved a spa room and was very happy with the size of the in-room jacuzzi. Actually, it was in the bathroom, but much more than a bathtub with jets. It fit the 2 of us, with room to spare. A very good selection of channels on a decent sized flat screen t.v., and the high speed wireless internet worked great. The wall unit ac/heater worked great and kept the climate at whatever we wanted. Bed was comfortable and I slept well. I had a corner room on the top floor and experienced no noise from other rooms. The

Great hotel, super clean, comfy beds, and great housekeeping service everyday. Graf nothing bad tip say about this property. Even the parking lot was beautiful. The were beautiful plants and a gorgeous bougainvilea tree for great pictures!!

dealing with family problems is never a  good time.  but at least our stay at this hotel is very comfortable and pleasant.  they meet all of my needs each time i come. the rooms are so comfortable and clean.  i do enjoy my stay.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your recent stay at our hotel. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we all look forward to you seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Clean, staff was outstanding. Good stay for the price. I was there on business, I had left before breakfast. I requested extra coffee for my room and the manager brought it to my room right away. I like the express check out because I leave very early and they sent my receipt the next day which helps out on my expense report.

We stayed at this motel for three days. During these three days,we were never given clean towels, never had the beds made, never had supplies replenished. We asked the maid if we could have the room cleaned. They answered in broken English that it would be done. I finally went to the front desk to complain, get clean towels, and coffe and creamer. The attendant informed me that they were out of coffee. I explained the situation to him but got no results. A VERY bad place to stay, the worst ever!!!
Manager Response: Hello Brian, I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations with your room not being serviced. I'll address this directly with my housekeeping department as part of the training. We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay and we'll work harder to improve on the issue you had experienced.

Summary: We have just left the hotel after a 6 day stay, and can only say good things about it! The staff were all extremely kind and helpful, the room was great, and the complimentary breakfast was great also! The room was spacious and modern, and had all amenities that we needed! Thanks for an amazing stay!

Good customer service.  The front desk people were very friendly and accommodating.  The breakfast was great.  The variety and quality was more than expected - it had hot items, cold items and different juices.  Very good!

Summary Heading: Decent Mid-Range Hotel A Quick Drive To The Beach
Summary: This motel offers a good breakfast. It's buffet style, and I especially liked the condiments for the hot oatmeal which included chocolate chips and sprinkles. The serve yourself yogurt machine was in-operable but tiny cups of yogurt were available in a bunch of flavors. You could also have pancakes which were spit out from a machine after you push a button. As for the motel, itself, the rooms have been remodeled but still look old. It was probably the mundane furnishings. My bed mattress was fairly soft and there were plenty of pillows. Even though the motel fronts busy Beach Blvd, I didn't find it too noisy. My room had both a small fridge and a microwave. You can buy some snacks at the reception; but there's a Trader Joe's up by Ellis. As for the TV, lots of stations but the

Summary Heading: service and hotel were very good but noisy other guests
Summary: Is on a busy street and had problems with other guests both nights. Staff, room and included breakfast were great. I have stayed here twice for 2 different events (races) and would stay here again.  I will be more proactive about  less considerate guests.

From the outside this hotel looks like a clean, older motel.  The property is well maintained.  The rooms have been newly renovated and are much nicer than you would expect from the exterior.  The decor is very pleasing and everything is spotlessly clean.  The refrigerator is on the larger size for a hotel room.  The internet was fast and reliable.

Good stay but nothing too fancy. This is an older motel but is clean and relatively quiet for a building where all rooms open to the parking lot. Comfortable beds. The breakfast is reasonably good and the breakfast area was well-kept.

I travel frequently for business and this is a great hotel for the price range.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  It was very quiet and sleep quality was great.  The location is awesome with stores and restaurants nearby.  I will definitely be back.

This hotel was very clean and nice... just steps to the beach and Huntington Beach! It also had breakfast! I would def recommend it! Reasonable rates too with hotels.com! I will be visiting this year again! 🏖

Very accommodating. The room was very clean and orderly. The walls and ceiling are maybe a little thin. The heater has a tendency to dry out the room. The staff was wonderful. Being that I am a bit handicapped, the room and preparation was just what I needed. This is a place I will return too and let others know to stay if they are in the area.

Best Western Surf City exceeded our expectations on every level!!!Thank you for making our last day of a short vacation awesome!!!  We had to change the hotel we were in due to a terrible experience (one problem after another!!!) a bathroom sink that was nothing more than a dribble, the hotel controlled the volume on the TV AND had a timer on the TV, very frustrating !!! 9pm cutoff time for the jacuzzi/pool, lamps that didn't work, waste baskets ridiculously small and difficulty in closing the front door.... :(  so bad!!! Our room at Best Western was so clean and smelled so fresh!! :) everything was perfect, 100% improvement!!! thank you!!!

Good location, close to shops and short drive to beach. Staff friendly and helpful. Clean room. Good self serve breakfast.  Pillows were a little lumpy, but otherwise comfortable.                        Pool small but clean.

Staff was very professional, friendly, helpful both during the res and confirmation process, not to mention during our stay.  Clean room & bath, good breakfast, fine daily room cleaning.  We do suggest they replace bathroom fans with quieter models with a separate switch from the bathroom light; reply was property will be renovated soon. We suggested they do those two things, as well. Pool was very nice, clean and refreshing. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Hello Bob, thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your recent stay at Best Western Surf City. I appreciate your compliments on our clean rooms and friendly staff. Our hotel is on track to bring it up-to date and we appreciate your suggestions and we'll address this directly. We all look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Great Location, Friendly Staff
Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the Best Western Surf City while in town for the US Box Lacrosse Nationals Tournament.  We were assigned the hotel by the tournament and our team had approximately 15 rooms for the 4 nights.  We had a great experience at this motel.   It is a smaller motel.  The pool is nice, and hot tub hot.  However I would recommend that they have more regular chairs by the pool.  Not all parents want to sit in a lounger while watching their child.  Breakfast was good and it is exactly what you would expect, nothing fancy, but the sausages were always hot and the staff were quick to replenish items running low.  One thing of note is that they had packaged blueberry muffins available which were peanut free, nut free and gluten free.  Usually we do not have an option for

Theresa was amazing. Location was perfect. Breakfast was amazing. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area. Perfect for the price. The pool and hot tub were nice and relaxing. Drinks available for purchase in the lobby were great. Thank you!

Absolutely love Huntington Beach. Have been staying at Best Western 4 times a year for the last 5 years. Rooms are big breakfast in the mornings . Staff is always nice. Close to Huntington. 3 mikes. Usually take uber in so we can drink and dance.

Came for my grandsons birthday. First time to see the ocean.Room was clean, staff was very friendly and breakfast was good. Close to the beach. Will stay again. Close to grocery stores and restaurants.

Summary Heading: Visiting with a Toddler first time Huntington Beach
Summary: Our first time in Huntington Beach with our two year old.  It’s a decent and clean hotel with a very nice staff. Theresa has a bubbly and warm personality and she was very understanding and good to our little son. Adrian is a sweet and mature young man who helped us out with all our baby gear and was very patient. I would recommend this hotel for a family going to the beach. The housekeeping and breakfast staff, great people too.

Summary Heading: People are Awesome in this Hotel
Summary: A very pleasant stay during my business trip. People are awesome. Nice tidy room, Housekeeper were helpful. Breakfast was delicious, waiters were so nice. I received an outstanding customer service at check-in from Emy. She provided me a lot of info on Huntington Beach attractions & food restaurants. She was also so kind and well accommodating . Looks like Hotel Management, Manager, House keepers, Waiters and Front Desk lady are well educated to the customer satisfaction. I wish that the quality of service provided will be maintained until my next stay in August. I would like to say that hotel location is wonderful & the hot coffee was superb.  Room was ready ahead of time as per my phone call with Emy which shorten my check-in time, Housekeepers cleaning my room daily, People

You get what you pay for, right?  The price was right.  We could not check in until 5pm, so we went to the pool.  The staff came out to let us know our room was ready.  The staff was great.  The room was spacious and the bed was comfortable.  The air conditioning unit was plugged into an extension cord?  We got the room with a Jacuzzi which worked fine, but there were no bubbles (or bubble bath to put in).

My first thought, its a BW, so don't expect much.  I was just looking for an inexpensive place in HB to store my clothes, take a shower and sleep.  I actually arrived around 1pm after spending nearly 7 hours on the road, with a baby and was hoping to get an early check-in and freshen up before we hit the beach, but according to the front desk personnel at the time I arrived, there was nothing available until 3pm, even though I saw a cleaning lady finising up a room on the 2nd floor when I arrived.  Anyway, I think 3pm is strict policy, no exceptions!  Front personnel did offer to store my luggage behind the counter, let us chill at the pool or even offered to let us to chill in the lobby with the baby for a few hours before the room was available.  It was all good though, we

Nice Room, big and quiet. Not a great scenery but the location is very good. Personnel worked hard on helping you out, breakfast was very good, and the bed was quite comfy. Great shower, too. Clean, quiet and comfy. Great Value for a business trip.

We spent four nights at Surf City Best Western and were completely pleased with outstanding and friendly service from check-in to check-out.  The room was modest, but all we needed, including a nice work desk and a functional bathroom with ample towels, soaps, and shampoos.  Breakfast was included and self-service, with fresh fruit, plenty of coffee and tea, four kinds of cereal, yoghurt, fresh pancakes (cooked by a machine on demand, something I had not previously seen), scrambled eggs, sausage, three kinds of fruit juice, four kinds of pastries. Nice location on Beach Blvd, which was a quick run to the beach and had a multitude of eating possibilities within a mile or so.  Not a luxury hotel, but a great motel and very family friendly.

Summary Heading: Fine for Road Trip Stop Over
Summary: Stayed one night while attending a wedding in Huntington Beach. it's one of the better Best Westerns I've have stayed and I heard it was family owed.  Staff was super friendly and helpful. The pool and spa was nice to enjoy after a long day. Location is real central right in the middle of Beach Blvd and not far from the Hwy 405. The full breakfast that is offered with the room had eggs, sausage, potatoes, toast,muffins and even a oatmeal,yogurt and pancake machine. Overall,one of the nicest Best Western Hotel.

Place is a little dated, the people were very nice. Breakfast was delicious.   My bed was very comfortable.  The outside looked like it needed a little updating.  Bathtub was loosing its finish.  My room was overall nice.  I would stay again.

Convenient location, great price, clean and friendly.....stayed here many times and always happy.  Highly recommend Best Western Surf City. Nice bonus is the good breakfast. Close to beach and shopping.

I have a very nice time at the hotel. It's very well located if you need or want to stay between Los Angeles and San Diego and close to fantastic places as Manhattan Beach and Newport. The room has lots of space, the neighborhood is quiet and the hotel’s staff is caring and friendly. I would strongly recommend staying there!

Clean but dated rooms. No in room safe. Didn’t have breakfast as only available 6-9 am. Staff friendly and welcoming. Approx 1.5 miles from Beach and Main St. Walked there but got a cab back as didn’t feel it was a particular great area but that’s just my opinion. Not much around hotel in terms of food and drink places. Good value for the price paid though.

Nice clean property. Located right on major road, has a grocery store and shopping a couple of blocks away.  Room was spacious even with two queens. Quiet, even though the street is a through fare, possibly noiser on weekends. Just a couple miles from the beach and Pacific Coast Highway. It is a blue level BW, but appears to have been recently refurbished.

Room was clean, beds are comfortable, great location for all the destinations we were going.  First time we stayed in March, had no problems sleeping.  The next time, my husband slept fine, but I kept waking up from the noise of a person in the room above us pacing all night long.  I am willing to stay there again, will probably just ask for a top floor room.

The staff are always great.  This time we needed an extra night and the staff went out of their way to make the switch to another room as painless as possible.  We always stay their when in Huntington Beach.  Prices is good for area and we feel safe there.

We pulled in at 11pm and the front desk girl was very friendly and helpful!  -Clean rooms  -easy to get to get around  -lots of restaurants near by  Short drive to beach   I would definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Good value, friendly staff, clean rooms!
Summary: Stayed here for an event on Huntington beach. Rooms were clean and had microwave, fridge, and K-cup machine. The staff was extremely nice, and it was easy to check in/out. Breakfast was about what you expect for complimentary (they have a cool pancake machine, but everything else is pretty meh). Location is nice - about a $8-$9 Lyft ride to the beach. Overall a good stay!

Hotel was ok, not great. Decor was dated. Bed was comfortable. Did not use many amenities. Staff was friendly. The area is not so great and between a bar and a preschool.  There are a lot of homeless nearby.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on your recent stay at Best Western Surf City. Our team works hard to make sure our guest are happy, so I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Glass drug pipe with drugs in it found.
Summary: After finding an actual glass drug pipe along with drugs in it still, i let the front desk know as soon as i found it. The extremely fake- friendly lady at the front told me they could give me 10,000 points which would be enough for a room if i booked through their website instead of the third party i used... if i signed up for this rewards program. i would've never signed up for in the first place if i knew that she was lying. The manager was gone because he was having a child which is understandable, but come on guys... No one can help? No one assigned for customer service if a matter like this should occur? After two weeks of messages and phone amd e-mail messages with Mihir, the GM, i realized that nothing would happen....he told me at first if it was up to him there could
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay, and we will continue to work harder to improve on our guest experience.

Summary: We recently stayed here for two nights.  I had driven by in the past but this was our first stay.  Upon arrival we were pleasantly greeted.  Our room was ready and we were able to check in early which was greatly appreciated.  I recommend the top floor only because I am a light sleeper and did not wish to have people traipsing above.  The outside of the hotel is dated, but it is going to be renovated in the near future.  Our room was very comfortable and clean.  Great mattress and crisp white sheets!  The room itself is dated as well, but I am into cleanliness not decor.  The breakfast buffet is well laid out and ample selections to fit everyones taste.  Best coffee I've had in a long time!  There is even a Keurig in your room with coffee and tea selections.  We received a call
Manager Response: Dear Sarah M,   I love reading reviews like this one, I'm glad to see you enjoyed the cleanliness of our hotel, staff friendliness and that you enjoyed our coffee selections. We are preparing for an extensive renovation in the near future but for now we pride ourselves in the cleanliness and service of our hotel. We know you have many choices when staying in Huntington Beach and we appreciate you choosing our hotel. Thank you and we look forward to you staying with us again in the future.   Santiago Garcia  Director of Operations

Summary: First of all, I do not appreciate being LIED to that "customer service" was closed until morning.  I was transferred twice and then told that customer service was CLOSED until the morning.  What kind of hotel chain doesn't have a 24 hour customer service line?  The first thing listed under amenities for Best Western Surf City was "Cable satellite television, HD."  This turned out to be completely untrue.  The reception was very poor and the only cable news station I could get was FOX News.  When I complained to the front desk, I was told "Oh, yeah.  We have bad reception".  The front desk person didn't seem to care.  I am now waiting to hear back from the Customer Service representative.  I demand a full refund.  I will never stay at a Best Western again.  You have lost a
Manager Response: Hello MichaelScott2013,  My team and I have reviewed our logs and did find this was reported and staff was dispatched to repair it immediately. We understand occasionally equipment may not function as needed but accommodations were offered. We see you also sent us two reviews regarding this matter and though we have no control over the customer service department as they operate under different business hours than local hotels do and for the weather or equipment anomaly that may affect TV signal, we appreciate your feedback and assure you that we make every effort to address deficiencies and improve service at our hotel. We hope you consider our hotel and brand for future stays, we can assure you this is not the norm at our hotel.   Thank you,  Santiago Garcia

Summary Heading: Horrible TV reception, they knew it and didn't disclose.
Summary: This was going to be an overnight get away.  Checked in after 2 pm and napped until 5 pm.  Turned on the TV and the reception was horrible.  Went to the front desk who confirmed " the reception is bad."  Best western knew beforehand the tv was not functioning.  Decided to leave and returned home.  They would not refund the $150.00.  I will be dealing with my credit card company to not pay.  Stay away from this place who deceives its customers.
Manager Response: Hello Scott, thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property. I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay, we'll address this directly.

Summary: The hotel was really clean, the staff was extremely nice. The hotel is located in a great area as well. Beach is only a few blocks away, shopping places nearby and there is plenty of restaurants around the location.

Typically we don’t stay in motels, but this place was as clean and nice as any hotel we’ve stayed in. The rooms are really big too. But the real treat was breakfast! They have a machine that makes pancakes, and one for oatmeal. We were all enthralled by the novelty! Plus, I have two kids who are gluten free and they offered Udi’s gluten free muffins, that made my kids morning.

Very clean on the inside that belied the older exterior.  A very pleasant visit - nice breakfast included.  We received good service at check-in and afterwards as well.  No problems during the entire visit.

The property was in great condition and kept up very well. Our room was perfect! We have stayed at Best Western Surf City many, many, many times and will continue to book with them for all of our future visits which will be at least 5-6 times a year to visit with my husbands family. Thanks for everything!

Stayed 6 days.  Thought I misplaced my coat but a day later my iPad also took a walk from A LOCKED room!  These are outdoor rooms with NO security.  I was told the security camera was NOT set up to RECORD and that "OUR PEOPLE WOULD NEVER DO THAT'   FORGET ABOUT THIS PLACE!
Manager Response: Hello. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. As we had discussed before, incidents like this are rare and we are fortunate to have a strong and trusting team to know that they had nothing to do with it. We are sorry you had to go through this and wish you the best in finding your misplaced belongings.

Summary Heading: Reasonably priced and close to the beach
Summary: This propert is 5 min from the beach and Main Street, nothing fancy but reasonably priced. The room was nice and clean and staff is friendly. The outside could use a tad more sprucing up. The only issue I had was the bed didn’t have a comforter and the blanket they put on it was paper thin so I was freezing in the middle of the night. When the front desk asked how our stay was, she said I should have called down but that was the last thing I wanted to do in the middle of the night. I just curled up to my husband who is an oven:) If we stay here again I know to order an extra blanket:) But all in all, good stay, I would stay here again!

Room was clean and big by today's standard. The biggest complaint that we had was that the breakfast service did not start until 7:00AM which is a no go if you want to get an early start. We had to go elsewhere for our breakfast. This was an added expense that we would not of experienced had the morning meal service started at 6:00AM.

Staff was friendly, location close to beach. I stayed for Surf City Marathon. Room was comfortable. Keurig in room. Planned to use jacuzzi but took a post marathon nap instead. Breakfast was better than I expected.

Summary Heading: A very good Best Western and convenient to the Huntington Beach attractions.
Summary: This is an older but very well maintained motel.  Our room was quiet and comfortable.  The staff were always friendly and helpful.  It is located on Beach Blvd which gives good access to any of the southern CA attractions and/or beaches.  We  would definitely stay there again.

Very nice stay at this hotel.  It looks like they're going through a renovation but the room I had was nice.  For being on a main road, it was very quiet, even with the childcare business next door, so I appreciated that.  Staff is very helpful.  The breakfast was fine with a lot of options.
Manager Response: Hello Judie, I'm glad you had a quiet and restful stay at Best Western Surf City, our team works hard to make our guest happy and I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: It's an older property, so I can't give 5 stars, but I do want to compliment the entire staff for doing such a great job of keeping this hotel clean and functioning.  Everyone was super-friendly.  The breakfast crew was fantastic.  The food machines were fun.  They had one that made instant oatmeal and one that made pancakes.  Neither were great, but it was kind of a futuristic experience.    The location is close enough to the beach that it's a bit cooler than the cities farther inland.  There are tons of places to eat all along Beach Blvd and the beach itself is maybe 10 minutes away by car.  In the lobby they had an artist's conception of what the place will look like after the facade is remodeled to a more modern appearance.  It will fit in better with the Huntington Beach
Manager Response: We appreciate the compliment on our clean rooms, we pride ourselves in our cleanliness at Best Western Surf City. Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful.   It was very clean and reasonably priced.   My brothers and I stayed there because of a funeral.   There was double king beds in the room instead of queens.  That was a really nice upgrade!

Overall nice experience. I enjoyed the breakfast.  The pancakes machine was nice and I like the other breakfast items offered. The staff was very kind and accommodating.    It was close to the beach and local stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Hello Patricia, thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our deluxe hot breakfast. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Manager Response: Hello Douglas, thank you for feedback, I'm happy to hear you had a comfortable stay and enjoyed the hot, deluxe breafast at our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: You'll love your stay at Best Western Surf City. Very neat and clean, and all of the staff are GREAT!! We are anxious to see the remodel when it's completed in the spring of 2018. We'll definitely come back many more times to stay here and visit our family members!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review and your compliments on our clean rooms, our team works hard to make our guest happy. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We're excited about our remodel as well, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The rooms were spacious and very clean. Staff was helpful, friendly and there was always someone available to answer questions. We had no problem with parking. Breakfast buffet featured eggs, sausage, country potatoes, and pastries as well as fresh fruit. Hot and cold cereals were also available. Plenty of shopping and restaurants nearby. Not far off the 405 if you keep heading down Beach Blvd.

In town for family at the holidays we were looking for a mid-priced comfortable hotel.  Based on other reviews we chose the BW Surf City.  We were very happy with our stay.  The bed was very comfortable, shower water pressure was great and the room was large enough for us to stretch out in the large chair & ottoman to read.  The Keurig coffee maker was a big plus and upon check-in we were given treats and water.  Staff was very helpful and cheerful even though they were working the Holidays.  Would stay again.

Had an enjoyable stay, but the hotel does need another elevator at other end of building...  Nice and clean, fresh and comfortable. Check in  was early and our room was ready which we really appreciated after the long drive.

They put me on a handicap room and I made a reservation for a suite. Had to wait about an hour to just get a regular room and got to the door and it didn't open. You can hear everything! horrible bed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback, our hotel doesn't offer suites so we apologize if the room description created any confusion and for any delay in getting your alternative room. For your convience we have a make it right policy in place and you're always welcomed to provide us feedback regarding your room during one of our quality calls right after check-in or before check-out. We'd like to invite you back to our property during your next trip to Orange County. You may email me directly at Mihir@tri-linholdings.com.

Summary: We have stayed here many times.  It is close to Downtown Huntington Beach.  It has comfy rooms and a great hot breakfast and superb coffee!  It is very clean. the staff is very polite and courteous.  The grounds are always kept up and there is a lot of parking.

My family stayed Thanksgiving and it was the best place for the money.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The beds were very comfortable.  The pool and spa were great, It was very clean.  The breakfast was great gave you lots of options

This place has the most amazing staff EVER!! Having worked in the hotel industry myself for over 20 years, I know how hard it is to motivate your team, but this team was simply AWESOME!! From the check in till check out and everything in between .... OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

Clean, comfortable and professional. Easy access to the beach and downtown area. Parking situation is pleasant and provides easy access for large and small vehicles. Restaurants are only blocks away...and within walking distance.

Very nice and comfortable room.  The front desk staff were excellent.  Very friendly and efficient.  Very nice breakfast with lots of choices.  I highly recommend this hotel.  I will definitely stay there again the next time that I visit the area.

Just a short couple of miles and you are at Pacific City Mall Great places to eat great views the pier is within walking distance...We love to go to Lemonades it a budget friendly delicious stop right by the great free entertainment almost every weekend we live the reggae singer.

Such a wonderful time! Very close to the beach and Panda Express! The staff was soooo friendly, and the breakfast was delicious! We have actually visited this location twice this summer from out of state and both times ended up staying an additional day because we were having to much fun! Thank you we are already planning our trip for next summer. See you soon!

My husband and I attended a funeral in Brea. We decided to take a few extra days at the beach. The hotel was quiet and close to everything we wanted to do. Great Staff from Front desk to housekeeping. They went out of their way to assist you in any way. We would certainly stay here again. It is in a great location, very accessible to the freeways and also the beach.

There were eggs, sausage, potatoes, pancakes, oatmeal, pastries, yogurt, and several other options. It was a nice filling breakfast! The customer service was great, too. Service was fast and courteous. They even gave us coloring pages and a box of crayons for our kids when we checked out. Just an overall great stay. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!

The rooms are clean and the overall ambience is quiet.  The staff is amazing and friendly, greeting you immediately whenever we walking inside.  Convenient to many local activities as well as the beach.  Easy access to other cities.  I have stayed in many Best Western Hotels throughout the western states as well as Europe and this is the BEST!

Summary: This was the "Best" stay we have had in a long time. The Staff was Friendly, Helpful, and the greeting was if we were Family coming home for a visit. Fabulous. Can't wait to make reservations for this location again and now looking for other locations to stay as well. Just a Fantastic.

The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and well-kept. This was my first time staying at a Best Western. I was pleasantly surprised.  I will certainly consider Best Western for my next family trip.

Picked this place because it was close to the beach, my friends I was visiting, and centrally located for a variety of food options. I will definitely be returning to stay here again. My room location on the top floor was nice and quiet too.

Summary Heading: GREAT Value, GREAT BED, AWESOME PILLOWS
Summary: When I travel for business, I look for great value.  I'm only sleeping in my room, so I don't much care about the rest.  The room was great.  Best part, the bed was not too soft, not too firm.  The air conditioning unit was quiet.  That is a biggie for me.  And, best of all, they had a bunch of extra pillows already in the room if I needed them.  Another biggie, the curtains closed all the way and there was no outside ambient lighting to disturb my sleep.  Great selection of TV stations as well.  In-room microwave and fridge made the room all the better.  A little outdated in terms of decor and could be described as basic, but for the price, a real gem and a home run.  As a serious business traveler, all of the boxes were ticked for me.
