Summary: This budget hotel offers a convenient location to the beach, free breakfast and ample parking.  The hotel is older and could use a full renovation, but the price was right so I can't complain.  You have to cross the parking lot to get to the pool - it's not terrible, just a sign of the age of the layout of the hotel.  The breakfast was actually pretty decent, we ate there each morning.  The room furnishing could use some help (the chair was filthy and stained), but the beds were clean and that's what counts for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it up-to date. I'm glad you enjoyed our breakfast our team works hard to make our guest happy. Once again we appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another opportunity for your lodging needs.

Summary: Excellent location with easy access, very pleasant staff, full breakfast including scrambled eggs and hash browns, fresh fruit, and lots more, pool with towels available.  We would stay here again. Our room had very comfortable queen beds with lots of pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. I'm glad you enjoyed our breakfast and our pool our team works hard to make our guest happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Best Western Surf City was a great value and a great stay!
Summary: i normally do not stay in places where the room doors are to the outside of the building but I will tell you I was pleasantly surprised at how nice the rooms where. And the staff Theresa and Jeanie were wonderful and help make a work visit a semi vacation!
Manager Response: We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I'll pass on your compliments to Theresa and Jennie.

Summary Heading: Not the best. Not the worst.
Summary: We picked this hotel due to the proximity to the beach. The AC didn't really work and the overall stay here was sub par. If you are just looking for a place to sleep and don't care about much else then go here. Breakfast here not for us. Not a quiet place if you're looking for that either. Staff was kind so we appreciated that. Our room smelled pretty awful and our room was very poorly lit. Rooms were slightly depressing in my opinion.  For a weekend we made it work.. worth it for a short drive down the PCH to the beach.
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feedback about the A/C and the odor, and we will continue to work harder to improve on the issues you experienced.

Summary: The ladies at the check in counter were super nice.  They had genuine smiles and were very comfortable with small talk.  They welcomed us to lounge around in the lobby and play a game with the kids.  When I said we should probably leave the lady alone, she assured us that we were entertaining and no problem at all.  There's a box of 'conversation starters' game on the lobby table that we were playing and also solving the rubics cube for hotel points.  There was a good breakfast that they refilled every time it ran out - even 15 minutes before breakfast was over.  Great coffee and tea available at all times in the lobby was greatly appreciated.   Good location in Huntington Beach.  lots to do within a 10 minute drive. Very reasonable rates, beach front hotels are $500 to $1000
Manager Response: Thank you for a great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our breakfast our team works hard to make our guest happy and I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my breakfast and front desk staff.

Summary: We have stayed here many times over the last few years and have always enjoyed our stay . Rooms are nice bed is comfortable and staff is always pleasant . We will continue to book best western . Close to the beach .
Manager Response: On behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel, and your loyalty over the years. We're happy you enjoyed your stay and we all look forward to seeing you again soon next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: We have been staying in this Best Western Surf City and it's predecessor Best Western Regency for almost 15 years and we keep going back even though the price/night has almost doubled.  It's just a nice, convenient place to stay--close enough to the beaches but far enough to avoid all the crowds.  The staff is very cordial and accommodating and the service is great.
Manager Response: On behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel, and your loyalty over the years. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: This is a very clean nicely decorated motel! I would highly recommend you stay here! The service was great....tje pool was clean....amd the breakfast was yummy! We stayed for 3 nights and enjoyed every minute!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We pride ourselves in our cleanliness at Best Western Surf City. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and our pool. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Best Westerns can sometimes be "hit or miss".  This one is very well run, very clean with friendly staff.  The location is great for the beach and everything you need is 5 minutes away.  I stayed with my 2 daughters (8 and 10 years old) and they loved it.  I would definitely stay here again, instead of paying hundreds per night more for a hotel marginally closer to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and we all look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Was surprised to pull up and find a motel setting. I might have missed that in description. I don't like that set up when traveling with daughters.   Though it was a quiet night thankfully.   I'm not sure why everyone has rated this so highly. I know the area is expensive but to spend over $150 a night for a BW is ridiculous.  Yes there is free parking, free wifi and free breakfast and think that lures everyone in.  Beds have rough sheets and blanket. Crappy pillows. Nasty thin carpet.   Staff at desk were helpful which is worth a point.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it up-to date. I'm sorry to hear you did not find our beds comfortable, we'll address this directly. Our pricing does change often based on demand and due to our convenient location between the Anaheim Resort and Long Beach Harbor destinations we always recommend booking as far in advance as possible when anticipating a trip to our area. Once again we appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another opportunity for your lodging needs.

Summary: Not as close to the beach ask would like, but the room was less than half price of the oceanfront rooms.  Staff is friendly and room was clean.   Nearby area was tolerable.   Very pleasant experience for entire family
Manager Response: We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed 4/20/16-4/24/16..on 4/21 we took the private sign off to have house keeping come in..we came back nothing was done. 4/22 catalina trip..out of room from 8am-6:30pm..housekeeping came and LEFT THE DOOR AJAR..OPEN..nothing was taken thank god BUT what if it was? whose fault would it be?? proceeded downstairs to talk to a manager but no manger was available  Gabriella behind the desk apologized and gave a us a bag that you would give a departing guest (apple/water). A half hour later someone tried to get into our room! if we were not there guess what? They would have been successful! The next day i head downstairs to the desk and confirm that a manager was told..i was told "it was logged in the daily notes" according to theresa..We never saw a manager and the only thing that
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feed back regarding your stay, we'll address this directly as one of our training topics for housekeeping department.

Summary: If you are looking for somewhere to go to sleep without too many bells and whistles this would be it.  The rooms are large but dated.  They are clean but dated.  The breakfast works for everyone.  They even have gluten free products.  Staff is amazing overall.  This is what make this place.  Front desk ladies rock.  The pool and hot-tub are small but clean and work well for a quick relaxing moment at the end of the day.  For the price you can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it up-to date. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Great!  We have always enjoyed staying at this location of the Best Western chain.  It is close to our family and to the beach and downtown Huntington Beach, CA.  It is the best value in the Huntington Beach, CA area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel, and your loyalty over the years. We all look forward to seeing you again soon next time your're in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Family owned, well kept older hotel
Summary: This hotel has been managed by the same family for many years.  They take care of their facility.  Everything was clean and updated.  The pool was very clean with nice furniture and an outdoor whirlpool.  I was very disappointed that I could not get a room with whirlpool bath.  I had reserved one for 3 nights using Hotels.com.  Then I changed to 2 nights and my whirlpool disappeared.  Hotels.com told me that the change made it a new reservation and offered me no help.  I am furious!
Manager Response: Hello Ellen, we all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. Please contact us directly for your future reservations and we will do our best to accommodate your requests. We all look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This is a great property to come to when going to Huntington Beach. The property is well taken care of and most relaxing. The rooms are clean and ready for your stay. The breakfasts are great and help you start the beach day right! The personnel are friendly and so willing to help. Thank you for providing consistent great service that keeps my family coming back year after year.
Manager Response: Thank your for your honest feedback and loyalty over the years. I'll be sure to pass on the compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Clean, quiet location yet close to the beach, friendly staff. The pool is a plus. Decent breakfast (limited choices of items, only a few tables in the dining area). The rooms are due for some upgrades but noting major
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it up-to date. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located to meet family to exchange grandchildren and meet further daughter in-laws family. Did not spend much time in hotel as we left the next day. I will probably stay there again for the Sam reasons.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. We look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Customer  service was excellent. Theresa at the desk was extremely  helpful and pleasant will stay there again breakfast was very good pool nice and clean all around a good hotel all the help they were very professional.
Manager Response: Hello Deanna, thank you for your feedback. I'm glad you enjoyed our breakfast and pool our team works hard to make our guest happy. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to Theresa. We all look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Loved my stay here, I would definitely come again. FD clerks very sweet and welcoming, was the cherry on top. The bed was like a cloud from heaven, the carpet was clean, bathroom was clean. We enjoyed our stay overall!
Manager Response: Hello Alejandra, thank you for an amazing review! I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my front desk staff. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Second time I've stayed here. The interior has been renovated about 5+ years ago. So, the bed mattress is comfy. Just wished they had more plugs by the bed so I wouldn't have to unplug the lamp and sit in the dark. The exterior maintenance is excellent being fairly close to the beach with salty air.  The staff and services were excellent. The pool was clean and the spa was hot but I didn't see any pool towels available when I entered in the evening. The bathroom is small and bland and the breakfast area is small compared to newer hotels but when the room rates are reasonable being 3 miles from the beach, it deserves a higher than normal mark for a 2 or 3 star motel.  I would not spend more than $137 here unless there was a major event in the area and all other hotels are booked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it up-to date. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Our stay here was good. I have no complaints. Staff was very friendly and the place was very clean. Breakfast was nice with great options for everyone. The pool was pretty cold, but that was probably due to the time of year it was. My children still liked swimming in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for a great review! I'm glad to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Very satisfied, great value, Good variety of breakfast items, clean rooms large rooms really liked the king queen combo room, would definelty stay here again. Will recommend to family and friends. Close to Disney land
Manager Response: Our team works hard to make our guest happy so thank you for your compliment on clean room and breakfast. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: Affordable BW property close to the beach
Summary: We were here for a family Memorial Service, so it was not entirely a pleasure trip. For 38 yrs. we have been going to Huntington Beach annually and stayed with a family member. However, our Matriarch has passed away and so the family stayed here.  As a travel consultant I have recommended this hotel to other family members who have stayed here in the past. When in Huntington Beach I will not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for a honest feedback. My condolences to you and your family. We're glad we were able to accommodate your stay and we all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Whirlwind trip for a conference: LAX Meet & Greet, accompany for awards dinner at Mission and early AM airport departure. Very few hours in room, a few hours of sleep. Nice coffee machine, comfortable room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. We appreciate the compliment on our room. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Family was here from New York .  stayed for 4 days.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast good too.rooms very nice and comfortable.  Gave us adjoining rooms. That was great too. Theresa was so nice and very helpful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel. We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to Theresa. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: I didn't find that the hotel went above and beyond as I've experienced in other locations.  The AC wasn't working very well as the fan would not go higher than lowest and it doesn't appear that they fixed it after I complained a bit.  We also noticed that it was blowing both cool and hot air, but I never got a definitive answer on if anything was fixed.  They were accommodating to us on a late checkout and the breakfast was a standard lower end with pancakes, cereal, eggs, sausage, potatoes, juice.  Overall I was pleased with the breakfast arrangements.  I haven't received points yet for the stay, but I expect them any day now.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. I'm sorry to hear about the A/C in your room, we will work harder on this issue you had experienced. We all look forward to seeing you again when your back here in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Very clean hotel, further from the beach for what they charge. Make sure you verify reservations. Made reservation 90 days before trip, only to find res center botched it. Hotel staff very friendly, bed very comfortable, room clean.
Manager Response: We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with the reservation and I'm glad that my staff were able to take care of you. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. I would recommend to make the reservation directly with us so that we can give superior experience. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: Quiet and Off the Beaten Path
Summary: I opted to stay on Beach Blvd to avoid all the noise and confusion of the Pacific Coast Highway Best Western in Huntington Beach.  It is not fancy but clean and provides a good breakfast.  It has a pool and hot tub and plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. We appreciate the compliment on our clean rooms and glad you enjoyed our breakfast. We all look forward to seeing you next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: The hotel was a great value. Staff was outstanding and very helpful. The hotel was clean and well kept. Breakfast was good but lacked in seating. The parking was adequate. Security cameras everywhere. The pool was small but well kept and clean. The other guests were mostly from a Europe. We would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel. We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. As for the seating in the breakfast area, we'll address this directly. We all look forward to seeing you again when your back here in Huntington Beach.

Summary: This is our 3rd or 4th stay over the years at this motel. It is obvious the owners have been making an effort to upgrade, repair and improve this motel every stay. Much nicer than a decade ago, and now a very nice, reasonably price motel close to Huntington Beach. Few items still to address, but mostly minor. Very polite and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel, and your loyalty over the years. We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it upto date. We all look forward to seeing you again when your back here in Huntington Beach.

Summary: This is an older style hotel with three floors of rooms all facing the parking lot.  The room was large, had a table and two chairs, microwave, and refrig.  The room was decent but found a hair or two in the shower (ugh didn't notice till I was already in).  A free breakfast was included.  There is a pool (I didn't use).  There is a large day care right in front of the parking lot and the kids were super noisy in the afternoon.  Luckily, they weren't out early in the morning.  It is a short drive to the beach and the town.  I paid $129 for for the first two nights and $189 for Friday night.  Seems pricey for the final day for this hotell, but I guess its Huntington Beach pricing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we know you have many options when choosing a hotel, so we're glad you chose to stay with us. Thank you for your feedback on the bathroom, we will work harder on this issue you had experienced. We all look forward to seeing you again when your back here in Huntington Beach.

Summary Heading: BW Surf City in Huntington Beach
Summary: We enjoyed our stay in the hotel, the staff were excellent. Our king bed suite suited us well. Ours was a family visit to experience the beach and we found the local bus stops handy to go to and from the pier etc. A good stay at a reasonable price. The pool was enjoyed by the 3 generations of us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed our King suite room and your family enjoyed our pool. We all look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: We were in Huntington Beach for a surf contest and needed a home base. We usually choose BW+ hotels. This particular hotel doesn't have much curb appeal, but the beds were comfortable; the bed linens were really comfy; and the bathroom was very clean/updated/bright/large.  There's a pool and hot tub in the parking lot.   Overall, I would stay here again if staying in Huntington Beach for a few days.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel. We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I understand our hotel is dated, we're on track to bring it upto date. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This is a great little hotel. The breakfast was fantastic with many options to choose from, hotel staff was very friendly and housekeeping did a fantastic job at keeping the room clean. The room was great and always clean, it had lots of space, the fridge kept everything cold, microwave was great for reheating leftovers, bathroom was huge and I loved the whirlpool fantastic for soaking in after a long day of activities without having to use the hot tub downstairs. The pool area was clean  and nice to swim/soak in on lazy days while the chairs were great for soaking up some sun. This hotel is smack in the middle near everything: food, stores, gas stations, liquor stores for the adults, and just a quick 5-10 minute trip from the beach. I loved my stay here and will definitely go
Manager Response: Thank you for an amazing review! I'm glad to hear you had enjoyable stay at our hotel. I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: This motel is just your average middle priced motel. Nothing special. Clean rooms, pool looked clean. They have a free breakfast with lots to choose from. Staff was very friendly. The only thing I didn't like was my room was directly across from the trash area and there were trash bags all around the ground.  Not very appealing.

Wonderful place to stay. Amenities are good, pool is lovely, breakfast is a complete meal and location is perfect. Close to grocery stores, shops and beach. Easy access to the 405 making getting around all of Orange County and LA a snap. My family will use this hotel again!

Awesome employees; polite, courteous, rooms clean, wake-up-call on time. Maintenance Staff replaced the telephone and light bulbs asap right after a phone call. Manager always smiling and willing to assist you whatever your request might be.
Manager Response: Thank you for an amazing review! I'll be sure to pass on your compliments to my staff. We look forward to seeing you again next time you're in Huntington Beach.

Summary: I grew up in this area of Southern California, so while on a recent business trip, we decided to stay here. The hotel and services were actually great. It is a three-story hotel, with large, spacious, comfortable, and clean rooms. The bathroom, while not too large, was super clean and stocked with lots of fresh towels. Mini refrigerator and little coffee maker in the room. Free cable TV (somewhat limited channels). Excellent free WIFI. Theresa, an associate at the front desk, was as helpful and nice as she could be! The hotel serves a very nice, free breakfast each morning. Coffee, fruit, eggs, cereal, etc. There is a really nice small swimming pool on the property, and a large, free parking lot. A double room was between $175-$195/night, depending on which website you used to
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, on behalf of myself and my team we appreciate you choosing our hotel. We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Theresa.

Summary: This hotel is okay. I enjoyed the cleanliness, friendliness of staff, and proximity to the beach. Compared to other CA hotels of similar rates, the breakfast is subpar and the proximity to a major street caused me to wake a couple of times due to noisy cars speeding down the road.  If I were to return to Huntington Beach I would not be opposed to staying here again. Thanks!
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear your recent stay with us did not exceed your expectations. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast, and we will continue to work harder to improve on our guest experience.

Summary Heading: Very Clean, Awesome Staff & GREAT fresh breakfast!!!
Summary: Teresa at the front desk was Very helpful & friendly...Betty does an Awesome  job with the cleanliness of the room...staff where breakfast  is served were very nice!!!  Please think about putting in Black out curtains  and weights sown in hem to keep them from blowing up when you have the fan or air on!!!

Summary: This is our third stay at this Best Western.  Everyone is helpful, polite and friendly.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, lots of amenities.  Fun pool. Great breakfast.  We would definitely stay here again.

We will definitely stay at  BW Surf City  again and hope our next visit to Huntington Beach will be weather friendly!

Summary: Located on the main road up from the beach and surrounded by strip malls, it's not the prettiest location in SoCal, but if you are only sleeping here you could certainly do worse.  The room was spacious and clean. Everything about the accommodation was average. The towels were a bit on the thin side, but serviceable.   There was a work desk, fridge, microwave and coffee maker, easy chair and TV.   There is a free onsite parking, a pool and included breakfast is in the lobby.   There are many restaurants and shopping centres along the boulevard so finding something to eat was easy.  I only stayed one night and it was comfortable.

Summary: Front desk accommodated my change in reservation since my flight didn't get in.  Big rooms, looks like recently renovated with newer bathroom, microwave, fridge, coffee maker.  There were 4 of us and there was plenty of room.  Nice but small pool area, even though we didn't use it.  Very much a motel but clean and had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review! We really appreciate it.

Summary: I stay at a Best Western somewhere for roughly 4 months out of the year. The price for this location in Huntington Beach is just a tad too high for the quality you receive. That being said, they do have an excellent friendly and courteous staff. The quality of the day to day items like shampoo and soap are much better than the typical Best Western. Breakfast is very good both in quantity and quality, however, be prepared to take it to your room because the dining room is quite small. Great for a weekday stay, I would avoid on the weekends unless you have to stick to a tight budget.
Manager Response: We all take pride in making sure our guest are happy, so we're happy you enjoyed your stay. I have passed along your compliments to our staff however, I'm sorry we fell short of your expectations and you didn't have an enjoyable stay at our hotel due to the pricing. Our pricing does change often based on demand and due to our convenient location. We always recommend booking as far in advance as possible when anticipating a trip to our area. We all look forward to seeing you again when your back here in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Room was surprisingly large.  It was clean and quiet.  Full hot breakfast was a definite plus. A good value for the money.  Lots of restaurants in the vicinity.  Pool look nice and clean - we did not use it due to time constraints.  Bed was OK, a little too firm for me, but that is a personal issue.

Summary: We've stayed here the past few years when we come to HB to visit our son. Our rooms are always clean and close to the lobby as my hubby has back problems. The breakfast are delicious and hot and the coffee is excellent. I enjoyed the hot tub this time but the pool was a little to cold for me. We visited the end of march and April. I would highly recommend staying here. The desk clerks are always so friendly and helpful. This hotel is also close to the beach and downtown HB.

Summary: We chose this hotel because of the cost and reviews, it can be quite an expensive town to take a vacation in. Check-in was quick & easy, staff were friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean and fresh with quality toiletries too. The pool was clean and towels and loungers were provided for added comfort. had it to ourselves most of the time. Breakfast was great the first morning however there wasn't any available seating the following morning which made it difficult to enjoy. The choice was extensive and replenish regularly by staff but they definitely need a bigger area or alternative. I would have chosen to be nearer to the beach if I had realised as we had to drive and pay quite expensive parking too. There was some noise due to the location of the hotel, quite noisy when in the

Stayed here because it was super close to the surgery institute. Rooms were clean and nice. Fridge and microwave. Close to the supermarket, Urgent Care and pharmacy. Lots of little stores with in walking distance. Beach about a mile and a half away.  Theresa at the front desk was very helpful and caring! We were in need and she did everything she could to accommodate us make our stay a pleasant one!

Summary: The Best Western Surf City Hotel was the perfect location for my trip. Me, my girlfriend, and best friend worked a festival in Hunington Beach and we stayed here. It was a great spot. Local food places near by, pharmacy was nearby, and the site itself had great amenities. The staff was amazing and very helpful. The roomshit were clean, the bedding was great, and the shower was magnificent. I would recommend staying there any time I am in Hunington Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! I'm looking forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel.

Summary: This was a wonderful place to stay! The room was very fresh and felt clean. There was multiple fresh towels, blankets and pillows. And the service was great, everyone was so nice! My friends and I had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend it to anyone!

Everything was clean and kept up with pride.  Great breakfast, very friendly staff and very comfortable bed.  Overall a fantastic property and experience.

I felt the Hotel staff are really caring & want to serve you. I would go back anytime I am going to that area. There are no loud guess & the staff make sure you are happy. I don't know all their names but they are all sweet & caring.

We stayed at the Best Western Regency Inn for a family wedding weekend.  We were checked in by May who was very friendly, helpful and accommodating throughout our stay.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The pool/hot tub area is lovely and the grounds are well maintained.  Breakfast was much more than the standard continental that is available at most places as it included scrambled eggs, hash browns, sausage links and pancakes.  It is not a luxury hotel by any means, but a great value for the traveler passing through or needing a base for other activities.

Summary Heading: lodging for the Surf City Marathon Half Marathon
Summary: This was our 8th year staying here while participating at the Surf City Half Marathon. The hotel is very clean and the staff, especially Mary is friendly and helpful.  They have a good selection of food for breakfast and they started breakfast early for all of us participating in the race.  I highly recommend this hotel for any vacation/get away to Huntington Beach.

We had a very nice stay for one night with my friends. Parking was simple, pool was nice and the room was clean and spaceous. Breakfast was good! Pancakes, sausage, eggs, etc... Hotel is a short drive from the beach. Price/quality perfect.

Stayed here three nights while visiting family in HB.  I stayed one night in the King suite and two nights in a 2 Queen bed room.  Both rooms were super clean and beds were comfy plus lots of space in the room.  Wifi was great and rooms had fridge, microwave and good size flat screen.  Breakfast was above average.  Spent time at the pool and hot tub after the beach and both were very clean as well as the pool area.  Staff was great especially Christine who worked out a few details I had on my stay.  This will be my goto place to stay in HB from now on.

My stay here was very unsurpassable! I stayed in a suite room with jetted tub and separate shower. Room was very nice, upgraded, comfortable, clean, crisp bed, great view to the street, stylish, and very roomy! It was not your average small square "suite room" with only a bed and bath. It felt very fancy! Breakfast downstairs was very good. Not your average fruit loops and orange juice breakfast at most other hotels lol. Good tasting eggs, sausage, pancake machine, lots of choices for drinks and grains, a spacious dining room with plenty of tables for everyone. And the coffee was good! Staff was very friendly and courteous. They answered all of my questions and needs promptly and professionally. And for a hotel near the beach, the rate was very reasonable for a suite! I will

Great place to stay. Recommend to anyone staying in the Huntington Beach area. Nice rooms, nice pool, easy access to the beach and other areas in Orange County. Shopping and great restaurants are all close by.

The staff is wonderful and extremely helpful in every way. The location is terrific and conveniently located with restaurants in every direction. Grocery stores and convenient stores are within walking distance. Although, if you want a quiet fulfilled night sleep, this is the last place you want to stay. If you have young children and they are well mannered than they will be staying in a hotel whose other children have NO manners or a proper upbringing. So be prepared to lose sleep.

Summary Heading: Close to Huntington Beach and short drive from Little Saigon
Summary: Very good customer service. Continental BF was quite good and also included scrambled eggs, BF sausages and hash browns among the usual fares. We had rooms on the 2nd floor (206, 207) which were good. Hotel is close to Huntington Beach where we watched a beautiful sunset one evening. It is also a short drive to Little Saigon which we visited 2 days during the Vietnamese New Year (TET) festival.

This hotel is so convenient to the beach. We rode our bikes. I was there for the SurfCity Half Marathon. May who is the customer service rep who checked us in is the bomb!!! We had such excellent care from her. I have stayed in dozens of hotels for my runs and nobody has taken such care in my accommodations as she did. This hotel was comfortable close to bars, fast food and the beach. But i'm telling you May made my entire stay...

My son and I had adjoining rooms which was nice. May was very sweet & helpful with my reservation. She personally walked down to my room to see if everything was satisfactory. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. I do wish they had microwaves. I would recommend this hotel and stay here again.

We will actually be returning to this hotel for our bachelor/ette party. The continental breakfast was really good. I liked that they had eggs, sausage, and hashbrowns. The rooms were newly remodeled and quite large and roomy. The toilet area was small but it's not exactly a deal breaker.

We went to Huntington Beach to visit family and this was so much less expensive then other options. It's not on the beach but it was clean and updated. All the staff were very friendly and attentive. Free continental breakfast was better than most. Hot foods included scrambled eggs, sausage, hash browns and pancakes. I saw another reviewer say it was in a crap part of town, I disagree. I would say it was not touristy. It's where locals live their lives and do their shopping. Short drive to the beach.

I am a longtime customer here and everyone here is very nice and helpful, especially May who was always pleasant to deal with. Room was pleasant, people was very polite. Thank you May. From Dr. Minh Ma 714-588-4998

This hotels staff is very helpful, kind, and accommodating . I have stayed here  a couple time and will continue to stay here because the price is so good. The have updated the breakfast items as well as some of the rooms.

Poor condition and somewhat dirty We keep asking ourselves are we at the " Motel  6 " ? The big whip  amenity was a warm bottle of water ,not even in the refrig!  I guess because the location has a name with a beach attached justified the high rates, even through IT was way far away form the beach !

It was a very nice hotel. The room was quiet and nice. The breakfast was decent, in fact the quality was much better than any other 2-star hotel I have been to. And special thanks to May, she was really nice and helpful.

Check in was smooth,the young woman at the front desk was great,she provided all the information i needed.The room was very nice,very clean.I enjoyed my stay.When the time came to check out it was done quickly.

Hotel was clean and comfortable.  The breakfast was decent quality with a better than average selection compared to other best western hotels.  The staff was quite friendly and caring.  Much less expensive than the other "name brand" hotels in the area.

this is a very nice hotel in a perfect location, everything at steps or minutes driving. very nice rooms, excellent beds, nice complimentary breakfast, FANTASTIC STAFF , May is a very nice lady who will help you with anything.

This is an older hotel, well maintained.  Everything works well. The guest laundry was one of the cleanest I used on our 10 week road trip.  Bed was good, staff very friendly and helpful, nice pool.  I had absolutely no issues with this hotel until I noticed the signs posted by the dept. of health regarding dangerous chemicals in and around the property. Not sure how serious this is as they haven't closed the hotel and there is a large daycare next door.  At any rate we stay 6 nights and have been home since early Nov. - not glowing in the dark or growing any extra heads YET

Best Hotel yet! The cleanliness and the comfort of being away from home was excellent. The beds and were comfortable and the pillows were Awesome. Staff "Thumbs up!" I would like recommend that a microwave should be placed in the room.

The appearance and price is like a typical MOTEL; but the rooms are much better than I anticipated. The check-in staff, "MAY", is really nice; she is friendly and extremely helpful. The location is excellent; breakfast is good. I will come back again!

This hotel is located in a very great location. It is near my son's home, the beach, shopping, etc.  Lots of great dining around the area. I had a training person check me in and although it was slow he did it very well

Summary Heading: Huntington Beach Best place to stay
Summary: The hotel is like home away from home.  Very warm and inviting.  The staff is like relatives making the stay like being in your extended home. Breakfast was great as was the cleaning staff. The location could not be better for those that like quick access to the beach and malls.

Value excellent,  Excellent location to get to the beach, shopping, resterauntants, and recreational areas.  Breakfast was in a clean area that included a good variety of foods.   We relaxed in a clean hot tup.  The rooms were comfortable and spacious.  Great value for your money

I stayed 3 nights here after a conference.   The rooms were all up-graded with nice linens, furniture & decor. Staff were friendly & helpful. Breakfast was large with variety. Hotel room was very clean. Much better than I anticipated. Lobby & outside decor is outdated but rooms lovely.

i was a little leery at first because the outside looked a little run down. But upon entering our room I was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean, spacious and had everything we wanted. The staff was friendly and helpful. The location was great. This is now our go to place in Huntington Beach.

I left some items behind and called the hotel to report this within 45 minutes of leaving.  The items were not returned to me.  5 shirts.  I believe that they should have made certain to go down to the room to retrieve my items when I called instead of trusting your maid staff.

The handicapped rooms for wheelchair bound people are generously roomy and easily usable.  The desk staff and room cleaning crews were extremely friendly, helpful and courtious.  The hotel is located within easy drives to shopping, eating and the beach area.

You will find that this Best Western provides an excellent experience from the pleasant staff to the rooms to the breakfast offered. Everything is clean and comfortable. The pool and hot tub are inviting.

very clean and the staff very helpful and friendly and professional.  the room is decorated very nicely and is comfortable.  The beds are so comfortable.  We felt welcomed and very safe there.  Friendly and polite people there, the staff and other traverlers were very nice and respectful.

Lovely hotel, very accommodating and helpful, friendly staff. Unfortunately we had noisy guests above us for two nights but staff dealt promptly with the problem when we reported it. Good breakfast, well presented. Would stay here again. Comfy beds, clean rooms .Laundry facilities were a real bonus as we were on a fourteen day road trip through California.

We arrived after midnight, stayed for only one night, and were gone by 9:00 a.m.  It was a rest stop of sorts, the place we stayed after arriving in town and before we went sight-seeing and on to a wedding in another city.  The exterior of the building was fine, but the exterior carpet was a little worn. Our room was on the second level, and I noticed that the walkway was a little sunken, so perhaps the balconies could use a little structural lift.  The rooms are all recently renovated, and our room was very nice and clean.  Nothing fancy, but perfect for what we needed.  The hotel was quiet, and even being on a major local drag, I didn't notice any street noises.  The staff was very polite and helpful.  The hotel provides a hot continental breakfast.  I think it was a decent

Recent stay at this hotel was for business.Location is excellent if you want to go to Huntington Beach , the pier or Main Street. Room are spacious and clean but could use some updating. Has nice pool area and a room were they serve breakfast.which is decent, scrambled eggs, sausage. cereal, bagels, juice and coffee.

Summary Heading: Best Westtern Regal, Huntington Beach, CA
Summary: I dread staying in motels because I'm adverse to carpeting and the carpeting is usually dull and dirty.  Try wearing a pair of white socks in your room!  I know that this is the most difficult area to keep clean so I always check the carpeting.  The room's carpeting was nicely new and clean.  It made for a peaceful night's sleep.

Summary Heading: This is a hotel that inflated their features
Summary: Not very accessible for some one in a wheel chair, and uncomfortable beds.The  handicapped features are not ADA acceptable.  The wi-fi is not always functioning.  They have a variety of breakfast items.  The lamps in the room  are not working with burnt out bulbs. Do not rent roll away cots as the springs are poking through the mattress.  Not enough outlets for chargers.  Motel 6 has better accommodations at a lower rate.

Excellent location; clean, well decorated and comfortable rooms; friendly, courteous  and professional staff; and breakfast was yummy. Everything about my stay was excellent and I highly recommend this hotel.

very comfortable feels like home we stay here all the time everyone here is very pleasant and helpful any time we need anything all we have to do is ask the pool and Jacuzzi are always very relaxing and quiet

the best from the time we checked in until we left. Very helpful staff above and beyond good service. the breakfast was good . I would not stay anywhere besides a Best Western. they are always clean and I always feel safe

We spent 3 nights here and loved it, the rooms were nice, the facilities were great, the staff were fantastic,  breakfast was great, it was very reasonably priced and only a short distance from Huntington Beach.  We would definitely stay here again, hopefully sooner rather than later.

Summary Heading: Best most affordable place to stay close to everything you want in HB!
Summary: We stayed 8 nights and found the room to be very clean and up to date. The staff was courteous, the pool was lovely, and noise was minimal. The free breakfast was very convenient and saves $ on at least one meal daily.  We would definitely stay here again. Short car ride to the beach. Close to enough to the 405, etc. Facility does have a coin operated washer/dryer which was very convenient for us. And the price was literally hundreds less  per night than staying downtown.  Only small complaint is that the wif-fi was not great...

I wasn't encouraged by the outside appearance of this motel. It didn't look great honestly. I found myself wishing I had shelled out more for a luxury beach property. However; the room was beautifully furnished with a comfortable bad and spacious bathroom. The small refrigerator was a nice addition to the room. My only real complaint was that it was noisy. You could literally hear conversations going on in the parking lot from inside of my room. If you bring earplugs and can sleep in them; you should have no complaints. This is as good as can be expected for a non-luxury property in this area. It isn't far from the beach; and with the convenience of Uber locally, there's not much reason to stay in your room too much anyway. All in all a decent home base for an inexpensive SoCal

Stayed two nights and room was clean, comfortable. Probably in line with the higher prices around the area; would be $100 in my area. Good beds and has fridge/better than the usual breakfast. Super friendly professional owners.

Everything was delightful, clean, roomy, tasty, peaceful - a lovely experience in every way. Staff was helpful, hot tub and pool relaxing. Room was spacious, beds comfy, breakfast was varied and good.

Summary Heading: Barf in Towels and Useless Blonde Female Manager
Summary: This was such a disappointment. The clerk with dark hair at the front counter was very nice and attentive, however the female manager with blonde hair was terrible. I had used a towel to find out after I had dried my shoulders with it, it had dried barf in it from some precious user. They either hadn't washed the towel or hadn't washed it well enough. How disturbing to know that I am now possibly exposed to some disease that the barfer could have had. This is a HEALTH risk. After the barf incident, the manager swore to reimburse us in some way and never did. I had to call and leave messages multiple days the following week after the end of our vacation only to be ignored by the blonde female manger.  She had the worst customer service and said she couldn't do anything to make up

I recently took a trip to Huntington Beach with my wife, and this particular BW was close to what we wanted to see. The staff was very hospitable, and made it a point to keep the property as clean and beautiful as it could be. The room was plenty big and well maintained. There wasn't a speck of dirt anywhere it seemed, and a lot of visitors seemed to enjoy the pool, especially the kids. Very happy with this stay, and I will definately stay here again if we come back to HB.

Summary Heading: first sight doesn't do this place justice
Summary: more of a 'motel' than a 'hotel' in terms of layout but that is where the comparison ends.  The staff were very helpful and recommended some lovely places to eat 'Black Bull chop house' and G's boat house bar and grill' the rooms were very clean and tidy.  they were having some issues with the wifi when we were there (it was working then it dropped out) but they were getting it looked into while we were there, we had to leave before it was fully fixed.  we were on the top floor and had our quietest sleep that we had had at a best western (the daycare next door did not wake us at all and i'm a light sleeper)

Summary Heading: Clean, nicely decorated, first impression deceiving
Summary: When you drive up to this hotel, you might think, "oh no."  Clearly an older hotel, looks like my 60's childhood with the 3 stories all facing out onto the parking lot.  So if you want a view, this is not the place for you.  But once inside the room, obvious that management has taken care to nicely upgrade this property.  Very large room, comfortable king bed, nice decor, nice bathroom.  Clean and quiet.    Guy at desk very friendly and professional, he  was the only one there and he was dealing with an overseas phone call and a lady at the desk who wanted help with her Internet and advice on where to eat.  He got through it all with a smile and genuinely apologized to us for the wait; I am not the most patient person, but he definitely handled a stressful situation with aplomb.

This hotel was clean, had good service, a good breakfast included, and had a fair sized room and bathroom. Everything was in good condition and it was decorated nicely. It was fairly close to the beach, though not on it. More hygiene items than usual were provided. The beds were very comfortable. The furniture provided lots of space for our things to be up off the floor. I would recommend this hotel!

I had 2 rooms for this night so my 2 sons could have their own.  My husband and I had a king bed room.  I had the best night sleep on this bed.  I never woke up once.  No noise.  comfortable mattress and pillow.  The breakfast was so good the next morning.  Excellent stay.  Loved it.

We went to CA for vacation. Stayed for 7 nights at the Regency Best Western Inn. It was great from start to finish.  Location was so convenient and a quiet area.  Room was clean everything was working fine. Breakfast area was clean and the food was good. The staff in the breakfast area was so attentive everything was fully stocked and hot (or cold) and fresh even during the busy times. We met at least 5 different people at the front desk during our stay everyone was very professional and friendly. The pool was nice and clean. The price was reasonable for that area. I would definitely stay again. It's not easy to choose a hotel from across the country but I relied on the TripAdvisor recommendations and I was not disappointed.

Summary Heading: Nice large clean room but a bit expensive for what it is.
Summary: Stayed the one night at the 'BW Regency Inn' whilst in the Huntingdon Beach area on business.  It happened to be the same time as the Surfing Championships so everywhere was quite busy and this may have hiked up room rates as well.  I had a king bed room which was nice and large and it was on the 2nd floor (Room #214). It was well equipped and nice and clean.  The bed was comfortable, the bathroom was clean and the WiFi worked fine. There was a swimming pool in the parking lot, which looked nice but I didn't have my swimmers. The staff at check-in and check-out were friendly and efficient and the hotel is located a short drive from the main Huntingdon Beach waterfront and Pier.  The only thing is that at US$193 (circa GB£130) I think it was a tad expensive for what it is.

From the outside, looked like just another hotel, but our room was perfect - clean, updated, quiet, very comfortable bed.  Liked the "clean" TV remote.  Staff was very helpful and accommodating.  We arrived prior to check-in time, no room ready, but within 10 minutes, our room came available and the desk clerk came out into the parking lot to find us - she went above and beyond and this was much appreciated.

Excellent service, our car broke down and the front desk got us in our room early and helped us find an auto shop. The room was very nice and had a lot of space in it. The breakfast was pretty good as well. It's also not by PCH so being by a busy highway wasn't an issue.

My only complaint about this place was that the guide on the TV didn't match the channels and that was frustrating. When you went to the Food Network channel, it was the Game Show Network. And nothing was on when the guide said it was. I did let the front desk know and they said they would call the cable service. We only stayed one night, so who knows if that will get done. If you're not in the room much, it may not matter to you. But everyone is going to watch a little bit, right?   Can't control someone stomping around like an elephant above us. but geez, it was ridic.   Other than that. very large room, two queens, beds pretty comfy. Everything seemed clean.Friendly staff. We would stay again.

Summary Heading: 2nd reservation was better than the first!
Summary: We booked two rooms for two separate reservations.  The first was for two nights, two rooms, 302 & 303.  These were over the office and were older rooms.  303 was nice, 302 looked older & had a slight oder to it, I don't know if it was what they clean the carpets with?!?! They were roomy and had all the necessities.  Our second stay we were in rooms 316 & 317, very nice.  They had been updated, large, had all the necessities.. The staff was friendly, and on task.  Pool was nice.  Breakfast room is nice and very clean, breakfast was good, had a nice variety. We would stay here again,

Stayed 2 nights in July 2015 while in town for a training.  Hotel staff was great at check-in and gave me options on rooms. I had read reviews prior to arriving and chose the 3rd floor, toward the back of the parking lot.  I didn't have any street noise and while I did hear some banging around late in the evening, I did expect that a bit due to the fact that the hotel was fully booked and it was summer.  I was travelling alone, but felt very safe in the neighborhood and in the hotel.  Breakfast was fine, not anything special, but plenty of options that you would expect for a continental type breakfast.  I think it is about 2 miles to the beach, an easy walk (or run).I will definitely be back!

Been staying at this hotel for 2 months now. Clean room. Clean sheets. Clean showers. Decent tv channel options. Continental breakfast, so nothing too fancy. Fresh fruits. Friendly and helpful staff. Close proximity to nearby restaurants. Great for business stay.

The staff is helpful and friendly and the location to other areas and attractions works out well. You have to book early during the summer month though as it was sold out at a time I was going to stay there.

This review is not regarding my stay, because my stay never happened.  Here is what happened: I was supposed to stay down there today with my family.  I booked this room a month in advance through Hotels.com.  This morning (7/3/15) I wake up to find an email from Hotels.com saying that the hotel cancelled my reservation.  THE MORNING OF!!! We were about an hour from heading down there, and they cancelled the reservation.  I called hotels.com and they couldn't tell me why the hotel cancelled it.  So I call the hotel directly and the lady tells me I am on a DO NOT RENT list.  I ask her why and she could not tell me.  She says I can call Best Western corporate to find out.  So I call corporate, which everyone I spoke to was very nice. The lady tells me she is going to have to call

Summary Heading: Not the first, probably not the last.
Summary: We have stayed at this location before and was absolutely happy with everything then, and again at this last visit.  The parking can fill up, but overall this is a great place to stay when in the area.  Even had a local resident/family member who walked in, and was impressed.  Look forward to staying here again when needed.  Thank you for another short, but great stay!

I have to confess, this was one of the top BW properties I have stayed at in quite a while Excellent employees, spotlessly clean, remodeled and large rooms, nice breakfast, close to the beach (  1 mile ), and an all quiet policy at night! The price is right too! Will be back again soon!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The property was well maintained, the pool was clean, and the landscaping was nice. The rooms were generously sized, very clean, and the bathroom fixtures were new, including the shower and toilet.  The beds were comfortable, the TV was nearly new, and everything worked. The air-conditioner was new and worked flawlessly. The value of this property cannot be overstated. The full breakfast was really good with many offerings.  There were sausages, scrambled eggs, toast, bagels, croissants, Danish pastries, three cereals, and an ingenious pancake machine where  you pushed a button and 2 pancakes slid out in less  than a minute. There were various jams and cream cheese plus apple and orange juices.  The breakfast room was on the small side, but it was

This BW wasn't as nice as the one we had in Cabrillo just the night prior. For one thing our room was on the 1st floor right next to the "equipment room" which had the laundry, ice and soda machines and a public rest room. It was rather noisy and lots of traffic passing by. Was cheap enough I suppose for Huntington Beach. was a good 3 miles to the beach, too far to walk.

We have just returned from spending 2 nights at this hotel. It was incredibly well maintained, the staff were all very helpful and knowledgeable especially the receptionist named May, who went out of her way to help us. It is about 2/3 miles from downtown so if you were wanting to spend most of your time there is is quite a way. However we walked it numerous times and didn't have a problem.  Overall a lovely clean hotel with great staff.

What a fantastic hotel! The beds were some of the most comfortable of anywhere I have stayed before, the breakfast was great, lots of variety! The free wifi, parking and pool were an added bonus. The breakfast area is obviously a bit small, during the peak breakfast hours it was sometimes hard to find a spot to sit, but the breakfast itself was fantastic and the kitchen staff were very sure to replenish empty items very quickly. If you are without a vehicle, it is a bit far from anything, but directly beside a Pollo Loco, which quickly turned into my favourite place to eat for the 6 days we were there, even when we had the opportunity to go elsewhere. About a 45 minute walk to the beach and the Starbucks around were hard to find but apparently they are around! Great hotel, thank

Never have had a bad experience here. All of the staff are always so nice. Rooms are clean, property is quiet, plenty of parking. For my needs it is centrally located for shops, restaurants, malls, beaches, even a Calvary Chapel right next door. Swimming pool and spa are always clean and well maintained.

I was a little leery after reading other reviews about the noise level, etc., and was very pleasantly surprised.  The reason for our stay was to attend a family wedding and we had a block of rooms for the night of the wedding.  We were booked in rooms close together and everyone was pleased with the hotel.  We were not a loud, rowdy group and followed the "quiet time" rules and I have nothing but good things to say.  I did not experience road noise as I read in another review.  We were on the 3rd floor about mid-way back from Beach Blvd.  I highly recommend this hotel

Summary Heading: Home away from home in Huntington
Summary: The staff at the hotel were so welcoming that we felt right at home for our first stay in Huntington Beach. Hotel is close to all major roads,the beach,shopping and great restaurants. Free breakfast was wonderful,room was comfy,parking ample and the service was first class.We met many guests who stay at this hotel every trip so it felt like we were the new neighbors being welcomed by many old friends of this great location.

The rooms were clean.  It was quiet.  The staff were friendly.  It was close to beach.  We were staying as a family group for a wedding and we were all quite satisfied with the hotel.  Those who used the pool and hot tub were pleased.

Stayed here for part of our holiday and the only downside I would say is it needs updating. The decor and furniture are a bit tired, but other than that, no complaints. It was very clean, good powerful shower, in some of these places they're like a watering can. Had a proper sized fridge although in description it says mini fridge, television, iron, ironing board and hairdryer, coffee/tea making machine, although only powdered milk but there are shops nearby to buy fresh milk if required. Free breakfast was good variety. I would say best rooms are on 3rd floor, as you have no-one above you and if you are in rooms 307 upwards you will have view of the pool and kids play area. There is a washing machine and dryer on site, soap powder and softener can be purchased from a machine

I usually never write reviews, especially bad ones, but I feel like I need to advise people to SAVE THEIR MONEY. Okay first of all this hotel should just be called a motel. Its DISGUSTING on the outside. The rooms are in desperate need of remodeling and the sink stunk of sewer that lingered throughout the whole room. I was here with my family and got a call from the front office to keep in down at 7:00 pm and that people had called and complained that it was noisy. Now let me tell you I know what being noisy is and talking at a normal tone is not noisy. The next day the guy working came and knocked on my door and said if it happened again he would KICK US OUT. So unless you are planning on whispering on your vacation do not stay here. We called and asked for more towels and they

Great value - clean, comfortable, convenient location.  It's a motel, not a place to hang out; but if that's all you need, you shouldn't be disappointed.  We were visiting family and this was an inexpensive bedroom - plan to use again in the future.

Just 5 minutes from the beach, this BW is by far our favorite to stay at when we want to get away from the heat in Palm Springs.  It's simple, with all the bells/whistles, without the supper high price tag.  There are a lot of really good restaurants also in the nearby area.  If your a burger person, Slaters 50/50 is a must, and for you back east people, a visit to the "Philly Grille"  will bring you back to South Philly for a Pat's/Geno's flashback !  The breakfast is just OK.  I guess it's rather difficult to please everybody in this department, but hey it's free, and if your hungry, and don't want to spend another $25-$30 for a breakfast nearby, this will work.  Enjoy your stay as we do every time we visit Huntington Beach !

We stayed one night here. It's okay for a one night stay. We stayed in HB for 4 nights and previously stayed at the courtyard on brookhurst. The hotel was nicer, but futher away from beach blvd.   Pros: On the main road in HB to get to the freeway, plus most attractions. Only about 1.5 mile drive to main street and the ocean. Rooms are big, clean had tv, desk, fridge, big bed and big vanity. Staff is nice and of course free breakfast is great. Nice clean pool area  Cons: It's an older hotel. Looks like a motel on the outside and inside. It smells old, dusty or like old smoke although these are non smoking rooms. I'm sure changing out the carpet and the updating the big updating the upholstered furniture will help that. Street traffic noise can be a problem because Beach Blvd is

When visiting Huntington Beach, we stay at this motel.  The people are great and the breakfast is very good!  It is a wonderful value and near the ocean.  We have always been treated well by the staff and welcomed at each visit.

The staff at this hotel are very attentive and professional.  They helped us meet every need we had.  We were in town for a family emergency and when we needed to extend our stay they worked magic and managed to fit us in when there were no rooms left.  They also had no problems letting us switch rooms when the first room didn't seem to fit our needs.  Breakfast was sufficient and the hotel was SUPER CLEAN.

Summary Heading: Good standard Best Western conveniently located
Summary: The Best Western Regency Inn Huntington Beach is a good standard Best Western product with large rooms, clean and well maintained. The staff is friendly without being intrusive and helpfull. Price is within reason especially if you consider the beach less than 10 minutes drive away.

The hotel itself doesn't look like much from the outside but the room we had was quite roomy, nice and comfortable with friendly staff.  But it really has it's downsides.  It is noisy, people up at all hours of the night, slamming doors, yelling, running up and down the corridors.  You can't escape the noise as the rooms all face the parking lot.  We had a room on the 3rd floor, in the center and away from elevators and you still couldn't drown out the noise.  Then there are the smokers.  This place doesn't appear to have a smoking area so everyone stands just outside their room doors smoking even though the there is a no smoking sign where they are standing.  Unfortunately, you can't escape the smell of smoke.  And something smells terrible near the pool area.  Not sure if it's

Summary Heading: Very clean; bed was comfortable, slightly more firmer than average
Summary: Very convenient place on Beach street, so close to the 405 and the beach (5 minutes to the beach).  The window unit was very efficient and quieter than average. Nice quiet mini fridge worked well; bathroom was extremely clean.  Comfy chair for reading.

A great place to stay for the price.  Clean, comfortable and quiet.  I really enjoyed the breakfast as it had a good variety of foods available.  The pool was clean and well kept as well as the pool side cabana.

great hotel, the rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable, good location, not far to the beach and the car show we attended, staff was friendly and helpful, we really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.

The staff was courteous and helpful. The breakfast was more than I expected, including hot offerings (eggs/sausage) as well as fresh fruit, cereals, muffins, etc. Even the coffee was quite good, better than what you find at some "express" hotels.  The rooms are large and clean and well appointed. The bed was also very comfortable. I would stay again in a heartbeat.

This was my first trip to Huntington Beach, CA.  Not knowing the area, I was hoping I had chosen a clean, convenient hotel for my stay.  I was pleasantly surprised at the cleanliness of the rooms and the professional and friendly attitude of all the staff.  I will certainly choose this hotel again.

Summary Heading: A little gem near Huntington Beach
Summary: Having trawled through booking.com and Airbnb for somewhere to stay in Huntington Beach, we settled on the Best Western Regency. After two months travelling across the mountain resorts of America, we fancied some sun, surf and sand. The Regency was clean, the staff were extremely efficient, helpful and friendly, the breakfast (included) was surprisingly good, the rooms spacious and ideal for our family of five, the pool and hot tub perfect, and best of all, it was exceptional value. We could then enjoy an evening out on Main Street and feel we had not overpaid for our stay.  The only downside was the group of classic cars who arrived late and left early and kept revving up their engines, but that wasn't the hotel's fault. We felt confident leaving our luggage in the car, the

Large rooms, lots of close parking spaces.  Room was very clean, lots of hot water and good area security.   Breakfast included scrambled eggs, sausage, hash-browns waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt, juices, fresh milk.

Summary Heading: Pleasant surprise at the end of a long day.
Summary: My husband and I had had a very long day travelling on the road.  We had started in San Francisco around 7 am and by the time we pulled into the Best Western it was around 10 pm.  We were tired.  At first pulling into the parking lot it looked like ordinary motel style inn with entrances to the rooms from outside,  it was dark and at this point we just wanted clean comfortable bed.  My mind started changing when we walked into the very clean nicely decorated lobby to regIster.  We had prebooked a room with a king sized bed and had called earlier to advise of our late arrival to ensure they held our room.  I was again concerned when we were informed that the only room they had left for us was a handicapped room.  All my concerns were in vain and because we were so tired perhaps

Very clean(most important to me). Very good location if wanting to go to beaches. Friendly staff and great breakfast. Easy to find with good parking.  Kids loved the pool and we liked the spa. Lots of resturants close by.

We keep coming back to this hotel in HB for its friendliness , and for its quietness and its closeness to a lot in Orange Cty.  Strongly recommended for a vacation OR business trip in the area. Far enouch away from the Interstate to be quiet , yet close enough for easy commuting

Summary Heading: Perfect for being near Huntington beach
Summary: The staff was amazing and the room was great. Close to the beach and near restaurants and shopping. We will definitely come back in the future. The jetted tubs are wonderful to unwind from your day at the beach.

Great value hotel, looks like a motel from outside but room was hotel quality.  Comfortable beds, great shower, free wifi, free parking & free breakfast. All that for a great price. What else? Close to beach

Location location location. This hotel is centrally located on Beach Blvd. in Huntington Beach Ca. and has most of the services that you might use on a business trip. There are several excellent  restaurants near by. Other service locations  include the US Post Office.  The pool is heate4d and very inviting after a busy day.

Summary Heading: Best Western, Huntington Beach on Beach Ave.
Summary: This is the only place we stay while in Huntington Beach. Close to everything. Clean, good basic breakfast, great staff. good pool, and easy to get to. This Best Western was recommended to us by other travelers and we have used it since out first trip to HB.  Good value for the dollar if you are looking for a good basic place to stay for your trip.

Summary Heading: Good quality for the price....but high noise level!
Summary: The rooms were clean and functional and the price was reasonable but the noise level was extremely high. If noise doesn't bother you, then this is an excellent hotel in which to stay.  We've stayed here before and not experienced this type of problem

Summary Heading: Too much light in the night
Summary: For the most part this room and hotel met expectations.Thw beds were comfortable. The breakfast was good, and the wifi worked great -- fortunately since I had some important messages to convey. However, there was one "glaring" fault. I am someone who gets up several times a night -- some nights - to visit the bathroom. In this room when I approached the far end of the room, the light above the sink blazed on. I would quickly turn it off and then the light in the bathroom would go on. I had two companions in the room, both of whom would have preferred to sleep in the dark. Someone may see this as a helpful innovation but it deffinitely is not.

The only problem I had with this hotel is some extra bedding they had in the room was missing. Well I didn't know there was extra bedding in the first place. So I dont know if they are going to charge me for the bedding at $150.00. So if you arrive at the room check for this extra bedding. If it's not there contact the front desk immediately.

This Best Western has very comfortable beds; the rooms are clean and quiet.  The layout is pretty standard, with outdoor access to the parking area, and outdoor swimming pool.  We were too late in the day to enjoy the pool, but it looked clean and inviting.  The hotel is listed as a non-smoking hotel, but there were several people who were standing on the balcony outside of their rooms having a smoke.  I think that is unfortunate because it does diminish the quality for the rest of the visitors.  There was an incident during the early morning hours with a guest disturbing someone in another room.  It was handled very discreetly, and I would not have known about it had I not been checking my group out early.  I was visiting with the night manager, and he was quite frustrated.  I

Summary Heading: Want a Great Stay? Then Stay Here!
Summary: I held an event here in the meeting room and everything was great! Event was great, Location to surrounding areas was fantastic and there was also great restaurants close by within walking distance too!

My wife and I spent 5 nights at the hotel. The purpose of the trip was to visit our daughter who had moved to Huntington Beach about 8 months ago. We used the hotel for sleep, shower, change clothes and have breakfast. The hotel is located on the business strip of Huntington Beach. If you are looking for a hotel within walking distance to the beach then this hotel is not for you. The hotel borders a day care on one side and a strip mall type businesses on the other. There is a busy 6 lane road in front of the hotel. There is a 24 hour Walgreen's drug store and a Carl's burger type fast food restaurant within one to two blocks of the hotel. There are a few other small convenience stores and fast food eateries (Subway) etc. within walking distance. The Room was a typical hotel

We have stayed here a week every March , for several years. It keeps getting better. It's centrally located to our travel destinations, its a fair price, the breakfast is good, the pool and grounds beautiful, the rules of quiet time are enforced and we love knowing what to expect every time.

My first impression was not a good one, i expected a much nicer hotel, the building looked old, the reception was a very little living room, the rooms seemed to be part of the parking lot, not so romantic.. When i got into my room it was a relief because the inner was much nicer than the building and the first impression i had.The rooms are not excellent but they have the necessary, the service is also good, and for the price it is a good choice if you just need a place to stay overnight. The walls are very thin and the location is good if you have a car, if you don't then it is a little bit far from the beach, must take a taxi.

We just needed a quick nights rest.  The hotel was great for this.  The rooms were clean and we grabbed a quick bit at the breakfast.  We forgot something in the refrigerator, when we called they so kindly saved it for us and we picked it up the following day when we returned to town.

We were very pleased with our stay at the Huntington Beach Best Western Regency.  Excellent location. The room was oversized and very clean. Breakfast selections included pancakes,eggs,french toast,sausage , along with the standard sweet rolls toast, fruit ,juice cereals etc.. The pool & Spa were well maintained. Conclusion : Excellent value for the price.

We arrived late Thursday night. The attendant working the desk was very nice, and courteous. The room was very nice. It looked like it had recently been remodeled. I would stay at a Best Western again. Thanks!

I needed a reasonably priced place to stay for a conference in Anaheim but wanted to be near the beach.  This three-story motel (with elevator) was all I could have asked for.  Lots of good places to eat nearby,  clean and comfortable room, plenty of parking, quiet and friendly.  Good breakfast too.  Free wifi.  Hard to beat the value.

Very nice rooms, nice business center, reliable internet, nice free breakfast, great customer service.  You get way more than you pay for. Great stay! Thank you for the great experience Best Western Regency Inn.

The staff was very friendly and helpful, and we were pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and clean the room was.  We were also impressed with even the small details that were noticeable and appreciated in making our stay enjoyable.  We would definitely stay here, again!

Summary Heading: Very good value, and well run
Summary: Very convenient location.  Clean, good staff, comfortable spacious room, with every convenience.  Breakfast equal to those of pricier hotels, although breakfast room somewhat small.  Particularly good value.

This turned out to be a very nice place to stay.  The location was convenient for us, and the rooms large, modern and clean.  It had a small coffeemaker and a fridge, which was nice.  The staff was all very nice and friendly.  Breakfast is more than the "continental breakfast" they have on their website, and included hash browns, scrambled eggs, sausage and pancakes, in addition to the usual sweet rolls, cold cereals and fruit.  The only thing missing was orange juice, which I thought was odd.  Our only complaint is that it was somewhat noisy in terms of thin walls and floors.  We could hear the TV and conversations in the room adjacent to us, and whenever the people above us where in their room, we could hear every footstep.  The hotel is older, and this is probably a result of

We thoroughly enjoyed our 4 night stay. The room was clean and very comfortable. Every one of the staff we encountered was very friendly and extremely helpful in every way. Only things that were a slight downer were size of breakfast room and no microwave in rooms. Otherwise, we'd highly recommend this hotel to anyone. Huntington Beach is a great place to visit and we'll definitely be back.
